01640 /***************************************************************
01641   Class: CMakeNfa
01642   **************************************************************/
01643 class CMakeNfa
01644 {
01645   /***************************************************************
01646     Member Variables
01647     **************************************************************/
01648   private CSpec m_spec;
01649   private CLexGen m_lexGen;
01650   private CInput m_input;
01651 
01652   /***************************************************************
01653     Function: CMakeNfa
01654     Description: Constructor.
01655     **************************************************************/
01656   CMakeNfa
01657     (
01658      )
01659       {
01660         reset();
01661       }
01662 
01663   /***************************************************************
01664     Function: reset
01665     Description: Resets CMakeNfa member variables.
01666     **************************************************************/
01667   private void reset
01668     (
01669      )
01670       {
01671         m_input = null;
01672         m_lexGen = null;
01673         m_spec = null;
01674       }
01675 
01676   /***************************************************************
01677     Function: set
01678     Description: Sets CMakeNfa member variables.
01679     **************************************************************/
01680   private void set
01681     (
01682      CLexGen lexGen,
01683      CSpec spec,
01684      CInput input
01685      )
01686       {
01687         if (CUtility.DEBUG)
01688           {
01689             CUtility.ASSERT(null != input);
01690             CUtility.ASSERT(null != lexGen);
01691             CUtility.ASSERT(null != spec);
01692           }
01693 
01694         m_input = input;
01695         m_lexGen = lexGen;
01696         m_spec = spec;
01697       }
01698 
01699   /***************************************************************
01700     Function: allocate_BOL_EOF
01701     Description: Expands character class to include special BOL and
01702     EOF characters.  Puts numeric index of these characters in
01703     input CSpec.
01704     **************************************************************/
01705   void allocate_BOL_EOF
01706     (
01707      CSpec spec
01708      )
01709         {
01710           CUtility.ASSERT(CSpec.NUM_PSEUDO==2);
01711           spec.BOL = spec.m_dtrans_ncols++;
01712           spec.EOF = spec.m_dtrans_ncols++;
01713         }
01714 
01715   /***************************************************************
01716     Function: thompson
01717     Description: High level access function to module.
01718     Deposits result in input CSpec.
01719     **************************************************************/
01720   void thompson
01721     (
01722      CLexGen lexGen,
01723      CSpec spec,
01724      CInput input
01725      )
01726       throws java.io.IOException      
01727         {
01728           int i;
01729           CNfa elem;
01730           int size;
01731 
01732           /* Set member variables. */
01733           reset();
01734           set(lexGen,spec,input);
01735 
01736           size = m_spec.m_states.size();
01737           m_spec.m_state_rules = new Vector[size];
01738           for (i = 0; i < size; ++i)
01739             {
01740               m_spec.m_state_rules[i] = new Vector();
01741             }
01742 
01743           /* Initialize current token variable 
01744              and create nfa. */
01745           /*m_spec.m_current_token = m_lexGen.EOS;
01746           m_lexGen.advance();*/
01747 
01748           m_spec.m_nfa_start = machine();
01749           
01750           /* Set labels in created nfa machine. */
01751           size = m_spec.m_nfa_states.size();
01752           for (i = 0; i < size; ++i)
01753             {
01754               elem = (CNfa) m_spec.m_nfa_states.elementAt(i);
01755               elem.m_label = i;
01756             }
01757 
01758           /* Debugging output. */
01759           if (CUtility.DO_DEBUG)
01760             {
01761               m_lexGen.print_nfa();
01762             }
01763 
01764           if (m_spec.m_verbose)
01765             {
01766               System.out.println("NFA comprised of " 
01767                                  + (m_spec.m_nfa_states.size() + 1) 
01768                                  + " states.");
01769             }
01770 
01771           reset();
01772         }
01773      
01774   /***************************************************************
01775     Function: discardCNfa
01776     Description: 
01777     **************************************************************/
01778   private void discardCNfa
01779     (
01780      CNfa nfa
01781      )
01782       {
01783         m_spec.m_nfa_states.removeElement(nfa);
01784       }
01785 
01786   /***************************************************************
01787     Function: processStates
01788     Description:
01789     **************************************************************/
01790   private void processStates
01791     (
01792      SparseBitSet states,
01793      CNfa current
01794      )
01795       {
01796         int size;
01797         int i;
01798         
01799         size = m_spec.m_states.size();
01800         for (i = 0; i <  size; ++i)
01801           {
01802             if (states.get(i))
01803               {
01804                 m_spec.m_state_rules[i].addElement(current);
01805               }
01806           }
01807       }
01808 
01809   /***************************************************************
01810     Function: machine
01811     Description: Recursive descent regular expression parser.
01812     **************************************************************/
01813   private CNfa machine
01814     (
01815      )
01816       throws java.io.IOException 
01817       {
01818         CNfa start;
01819         CNfa p;
01820         SparseBitSet states;
01821 
01822         if (CUtility.DESCENT_DEBUG)
01823           {
01824             CUtility.enter("machine",m_spec.m_lexeme,m_spec.m_current_token);
01825           }
01826 
01827         start = CAlloc.newCNfa(m_spec);
01828         p = start;
01829             
01830         states = m_lexGen.getStates();
01831 
01832         /* Begin: Added for states. */
01833         m_spec.m_current_token = m_lexGen.EOS;
01834         m_lexGen.advance();
01835         /* End: Added for states. */
01836         
01837         if (m_lexGen.END_OF_INPUT != m_spec.m_current_token) // CSA fix.
01838           {
01839             p.m_next = rule();
01840             
01841             processStates(states,p.m_next);
01842           }
01843 
01844         while (m_lexGen.END_OF_INPUT != m_spec.m_current_token)
01845           {
01846             /* Make state changes HERE. */
01847             states = m_lexGen.getStates();
01848         
01849             /* Begin: Added for states. */
01850             m_lexGen.advance();
01851             if (m_lexGen.END_OF_INPUT == m_spec.m_current_token)
01852               { 
01853                 break;
01854               }
01855             /* End: Added for states. */
01856             
01857             p.m_next2 = CAlloc.newCNfa(m_spec);
01858             p = p.m_next2;
01859             p.m_next = rule();
01860             
01861             processStates(states,p.m_next);
01862           }
01863 
01864         // CSA: add pseudo-rules for BOL and EOF
01865         SparseBitSet all_states = new SparseBitSet();
01866         for (int i = 0; i < m_spec.m_states.size(); ++i)
01867                 all_states.set(i);
01868         p.m_next2 = CAlloc.newCNfa(m_spec);
01869         p = p.m_next2;
01870         p.m_next = CAlloc.newCNfa(m_spec);
01871         p.m_next.m_edge = CNfa.CCL;
01872         p.m_next.m_next = CAlloc.newCNfa(m_spec);
01873         p.m_next.m_set = new CSet();
01874         p.m_next.m_set.add(m_spec.BOL);
01875         p.m_next.m_set.add(m_spec.EOF);
01876         p.m_next.m_next.m_accept = // do-nothing accept rule
01877             new CAccept(new char[0], 0, m_input.m_line_number+1);
01878         processStates(all_states,p.m_next);
01879         // CSA: done. 
01880 
01881         if (CUtility.DESCENT_DEBUG)
01882           {
01883             CUtility.leave("machine",m_spec.m_lexeme,m_spec.m_current_token);
01884           }
01885 
01886         return start;
01887       }
01888   
01889   /***************************************************************
01890     Function: rule
01891     Description: Recursive descent regular expression parser.
01892     **************************************************************/
01893   private CNfa rule
01894     (
01895      )
01896       throws java.io.IOException 
01897       {
01898         CNfaPair pair; 
01899         CNfa p;
01900         CNfa start = null;
01901         CNfa end = null;
01902         int anchor = CSpec.NONE;
01903 
01904         if (CUtility.DESCENT_DEBUG)
01905           {
01906             CUtility.enter("rule",m_spec.m_lexeme,m_spec.m_current_token);
01907           }
01908 
01909         pair = CAlloc.newCNfaPair();
01910 
01911         if (m_lexGen.AT_BOL == m_spec.m_current_token)
01912           {
01913             anchor = anchor | CSpec.START;
01914             m_lexGen.advance();
01915             expr(pair);
01916 
01917             // CSA: fixed beginning-of-line operator. 8-aug-1999
01918             start = CAlloc.newCNfa(m_spec);
01919             start.m_edge = m_spec.BOL;
01920             start.m_next = pair.m_start;
01921             end = pair.m_end;
01922           }
01923         else
01924           {
01925             expr(pair);
01926             start = pair.m_start;
01927             end = pair.m_end;
01928           }
01929 
01930         if (m_lexGen.AT_EOL == m_spec.m_current_token)
01931           {
01932             m_lexGen.advance();
01933             // CSA: fixed end-of-line operator. 8-aug-1999
01934             CNfaPair nlpair = CAlloc.newNLPair(m_spec);
01935             end.m_next = CAlloc.newCNfa(m_spec);
01936             end.m_next.m_next = nlpair.m_start;
01937             end.m_next.m_next2 = CAlloc.newCNfa(m_spec);
01938             end.m_next.m_next2.m_edge = m_spec.EOF;
01939             end.m_next.m_next2.m_next = nlpair.m_end;
01940             end = nlpair.m_end;
01941             anchor = anchor | CSpec.END;
01942           }
01943 
01944         /* Check for null rules. Charles Fischer found this bug. [CSA] */
01945         if (end==null)
01946             CError.parse_error(CError.E_ZERO, m_input.m_line_number);
01947 
01948         /* Handle end of regular expression.  See page 103. */
01949         end.m_accept = m_lexGen.packAccept();
01950         end.m_anchor = anchor;
01951 
01952         /* Begin: Removed for states. */
01953         /*m_lexGen.advance();*/
01954         /* End: Removed for states. */
01955 
01956         if (CUtility.DESCENT_DEBUG)
01957           {
01958             CUtility.leave("rule",m_spec.m_lexeme,m_spec.m_current_token);
01959           }
01960 
01961         return start;
01962       }
01963             
01964   /***************************************************************
01965     Function: expr
01966     Description: Recursive descent regular expression parser.
01967     **************************************************************/
01968   private void expr
01969     (
01970      CNfaPair pair
01971      )
01972       throws java.io.IOException 
01973       {
01974         CNfaPair e2_pair;
01975         CNfa p;
01976         
01977         if (CUtility.DESCENT_DEBUG)
01978           {
01979             CUtility.enter("expr",m_spec.m_lexeme,m_spec.m_current_token);
01980           }
01981 
01982         if (CUtility.DEBUG)
01983           {
01984             CUtility.ASSERT(null != pair);
01985           }
01986 
01987         e2_pair = CAlloc.newCNfaPair();
01988 
01989         cat_expr(pair);
01990         
01991         while (m_lexGen.OR == m_spec.m_current_token)
01992           {
01993             m_lexGen.advance();
01994             cat_expr(e2_pair);
01995 
01996             p = CAlloc.newCNfa(m_spec);
01997             p.m_next2 = e2_pair.m_start;
01998             p.m_next = pair.m_start;
01999             pair.m_start = p;
02000             
02001             p = CAlloc.newCNfa(m_spec);
02002             pair.m_end.m_next = p;
02003             e2_pair.m_end.m_next = p;
02004             pair.m_end = p;
02005           }
02006 
02007         if (CUtility.DESCENT_DEBUG)
02008           {
02009             CUtility.leave("expr",m_spec.m_lexeme,m_spec.m_current_token);
02010           }
02011       }
02012             
02013   /***************************************************************
02014     Function: cat_expr
02015     Description: Recursive descent regular expression parser.
02016     **************************************************************/
02017   private void cat_expr
02018     (
02019      CNfaPair pair
02020      )
02021       throws java.io.IOException 
02022       {
02023         CNfaPair e2_pair;
02024 
02025         if (CUtility.DESCENT_DEBUG)
02026           {
02027             CUtility.enter("cat_expr",m_spec.m_lexeme,m_spec.m_current_token);
02028           }
02029 
02030         if (CUtility.DEBUG)
02031           {
02032             CUtility.ASSERT(null != pair);
02033           }
02034         
02035         e2_pair = CAlloc.newCNfaPair();
02036         
02037         if (first_in_cat(m_spec.m_current_token))
02038           {
02039             factor(pair);
02040           }
02041 
02042         while (first_in_cat(m_spec.m_current_token))
02043           {
02044             factor(e2_pair);
02045 
02046             /* Destroy */
02047             pair.m_end.mimic(e2_pair.m_start);
02048             discardCNfa(e2_pair.m_start);
02049             
02050             pair.m_end = e2_pair.m_end;
02051           }
02052 
02053         if (CUtility.DESCENT_DEBUG)
02054           {
02055             CUtility.leave("cat_expr",m_spec.m_lexeme,m_spec.m_current_token);
02056           }
02057       }
02058   
02059   /***************************************************************
02060     Function: first_in_cat
02061     Description: Recursive descent regular expression parser.
02062     **************************************************************/
02063   private boolean first_in_cat
02064     (
02065      int token
02066      )
02067       {
02068         switch (token)
02069           {
02070           case CLexGen.CLOSE_PAREN:
02071           case CLexGen.AT_EOL:
02072           case CLexGen.OR:
02073           case CLexGen.EOS:
02074             return false;
02075             
02076           case CLexGen.CLOSURE:
02077           case CLexGen.PLUS_CLOSE:
02078           case CLexGen.OPTIONAL:
02079             CError.parse_error(CError.E_CLOSE,m_input.m_line_number);
02080             return false;
02081 
02082           case CLexGen.CCL_END:
02083             CError.parse_error(CError.E_BRACKET,m_input.m_line_number);
02084             return false;
02085 
02086           case CLexGen.AT_BOL:
02087             CError.parse_error(CError.E_BOL,m_input.m_line_number);
02088             return false;
02089 
02090           default:
02091             break;
02092           }
02093 
02094         return true;
02095       }
02096 
02097   /***************************************************************
02098     Function: factor
02099     Description: Recursive descent regular expression parser.
02100     **************************************************************/
02101   private void factor
02102     (
02103      CNfaPair pair
02104      )
02105       throws java.io.IOException 
02106       {
02107         CNfa start = null;
02108         CNfa end = null;
02109 
02110         if (CUtility.DESCENT_DEBUG)
02111           {
02112             CUtility.enter("factor",m_spec.m_lexeme,m_spec.m_current_token);
02113           }
02114 
02115         term(pair);
02116 
02117         if (m_lexGen.CLOSURE == m_spec.m_current_token
02118             || m_lexGen.PLUS_CLOSE == m_spec.m_current_token
02119             || m_lexGen.OPTIONAL == m_spec.m_current_token)
02120           {
02121             start = CAlloc.newCNfa(m_spec);
02122             end = CAlloc.newCNfa(m_spec);
02123             
02124             start.m_next = pair.m_start;
02125             pair.m_end.m_next = end;
02126 
02127             if (m_lexGen.CLOSURE == m_spec.m_current_token
02128                 || m_lexGen.OPTIONAL == m_spec.m_current_token)
02129               {
02130                 start.m_next2 = end;
02131               }
02132             
02133             if (m_lexGen.CLOSURE == m_spec.m_current_token
02134                 || m_lexGen.PLUS_CLOSE == m_spec.m_current_token)
02135               {
02136                 pair.m_end.m_next2 = pair.m_start;
02137               }
02138             
02139             pair.m_start = start;
02140             pair.m_end = end;
02141             m_lexGen.advance();
02142           }
02143 
02144         if (CUtility.DESCENT_DEBUG)
02145           {
02146             CUtility.leave("factor",m_spec.m_lexeme,m_spec.m_current_token);
02147           }
02148       }
02149       
02150   /***************************************************************
02151     Function: term
02152     Description: Recursive descent regular expression parser.
02153     **************************************************************/
02154   private void term
02155     (
02156      CNfaPair pair
02157      )
02158       throws java.io.IOException 
02159       {
02160         CNfa start;
02161         boolean isAlphaL;
02162         int c;
02163 
02164         if (CUtility.DESCENT_DEBUG)
02165           {
02166             CUtility.enter("term",m_spec.m_lexeme,m_spec.m_current_token);
02167           }
02168 
02169         if (m_lexGen.OPEN_PAREN == m_spec.m_current_token)
02170           {
02171             m_lexGen.advance();
02172             expr(pair);
02173 
02174             if (m_lexGen.CLOSE_PAREN == m_spec.m_current_token)
02175               {
02176                 m_lexGen.advance();
02177               }
02178             else
02179               {
02180                 CError.parse_error(CError.E_SYNTAX,m_input.m_line_number);
02181               }
02182           }
02183         else
02184           {
02185             start = CAlloc.newCNfa(m_spec);
02186             pair.m_start = start;
02187 
02188             start.m_next = CAlloc.newCNfa(m_spec);
02189             pair.m_end = start.m_next;
02190 
02191             if (m_lexGen.L == m_spec.m_current_token &&
02192                 Character.isLetter(m_spec.m_lexeme)) 
02193               {
02194                 isAlphaL = true;
02195               } 
02196             else 
02197               {
02198                 isAlphaL = false;
02199               }
02200             if (false == (m_lexGen.ANY == m_spec.m_current_token
02201                           || m_lexGen.CCL_START == m_spec.m_current_token
02202                           || (m_spec.m_ignorecase && isAlphaL)))
02203               {
02204                 start.m_edge = m_spec.m_lexeme;
02205                 m_lexGen.advance();
02206               }
02207             else
02208               {
02209                 start.m_edge = CNfa.CCL;
02210                 
02211                 start.m_set = new CSet();
02212 
02213                 /* Match case-insensitive letters using character class. */
02214                 if (m_spec.m_ignorecase && isAlphaL) 
02215                   {
02216                     start.m_set.addncase(m_spec.m_lexeme);
02217                   }
02218                 /* Match dot (.) using character class. */
02219                 else if (m_lexGen.ANY == m_spec.m_current_token)
02220                   {
02221                     start.m_set.add('\n');
02222                     start.m_set.add('\r');
02223                     // CSA: exclude BOL and EOF from character classes
02224                     start.m_set.add(m_spec.BOL);
02225                     start.m_set.add(m_spec.EOF);
02226                     start.m_set.complement();
02227                   }
02228                 else
02229                   {
02230                     m_lexGen.advance();
02231                     if (m_lexGen.AT_BOL == m_spec.m_current_token)
02232                       {
02233                         m_lexGen.advance();
02234 
02235                         // CSA: exclude BOL and EOF from character classes
02236                         start.m_set.add(m_spec.BOL);
02237                         start.m_set.add(m_spec.EOF);
02238                         start.m_set.complement();
02239                       }
02240                     if (false == (m_lexGen.CCL_END == m_spec.m_current_token))
02241                       {
02242                         dodash(start.m_set);
02243                       }
02244                     /*else
02245                       {
02246                         for (c = 0; c <= ' '; ++c)
02247                           {
02248                             start.m_set.add((byte) c);
02249                           }
02250                       }*/
02251                   }
02252                 m_lexGen.advance();
02253               }
02254           }
02255 
02256         if (CUtility.DESCENT_DEBUG)
02257           {
02258             CUtility.leave("term",m_spec.m_lexeme,m_spec.m_current_token);
02259           }
02260       }
02261 
02262   /***************************************************************
02263     Function: dodash
02264     Description: Recursive descent regular expression parser.
02265     **************************************************************/
02266   private void dodash
02267     (
02268      CSet set
02269      )
02270       throws java.io.IOException 
02271         {
02272           int first = -1;
02273           
02274           if (CUtility.DESCENT_DEBUG)
02275             {
02276               CUtility.enter("dodash",m_spec.m_lexeme,m_spec.m_current_token);
02277             }
02278           
02279           while (m_lexGen.EOS != m_spec.m_current_token 
02280                  && m_lexGen.CCL_END != m_spec.m_current_token)
02281             {
02282               // DASH loses its special meaning if it is first in class.
02283               if (m_lexGen.DASH == m_spec.m_current_token && -1 != first)
02284                 {
02285                   m_lexGen.advance();
02286                   // DASH loses its special meaning if it is last in class.
02287                   if (m_spec.m_current_token == m_lexGen.CCL_END)
02288                     {
02289                       // 'first' already in set.
02290                       set.add('-');
02291                       break;
02292                     }
02293                   for ( ; first <= m_spec.m_lexeme; ++first)
02294                     {
02295                       if (m_spec.m_ignorecase) 
02296                         set.addncase((char)first);
02297                       else
02298                         set.add(first);
02299                     }  
02300                 }
02301               else
02302                 {
02303                   first = m_spec.m_lexeme;
02304                   if (m_spec.m_ignorecase)
02305                     set.addncase(m_spec.m_lexeme);
02306                   else
02307                     set.add(m_spec.m_lexeme);
02308                 }
02309 
02310               m_lexGen.advance();
02311             }
02312           
02313         if (CUtility.DESCENT_DEBUG)
02314           {
02315             CUtility.leave("dodash",m_spec.m_lexeme,m_spec.m_current_token);
02316           }
02317       }
02318 }
02319 
02324 class CSimplifyNfa
02325 {
02326   private int[] ccls; // character class mapping.
02327   private int original_charset_size; // original charset size
02328   private int mapped_charset_size; // reduced charset size
02329 
02330   void simplify(CSpec m_spec) {
02331     computeClasses(m_spec); // initialize fields.
02332     
02333     // now rewrite the NFA using our character class mapping.
02334     for (Enumeration e=m_spec.m_nfa_states.elements(); e.hasMoreElements(); ) {
02335       CNfa nfa = (CNfa) e.nextElement();
02336       if (nfa.m_edge==CNfa.EMPTY || nfa.m_edge==CNfa.EPSILON)
02337         continue; // no change.
02338       if (nfa.m_edge==CNfa.CCL) {
02339         CSet ncset = new CSet();
02340         ncset.map(nfa.m_set, ccls); // map it.
02341         nfa.m_set = ncset;
02342       } else { // single character
02343         nfa.m_edge = ccls[nfa.m_edge]; // map it.
02344       }
02345     }
02346 
02347     // now update m_spec with the mapping.
02348     m_spec.m_ccls_map = ccls;
02349     m_spec.m_dtrans_ncols = mapped_charset_size;
02350   }
02356   private void computeClasses(CSpec m_spec) {
02357     this.original_charset_size = m_spec.m_dtrans_ncols;
02358     this.ccls = new int[original_charset_size]; // initially all zero.
02359 
02360     int nextcls = 1;
02361     SparseBitSet clsA = new SparseBitSet(), clsB = new SparseBitSet();
02362     Hashtable h = new Hashtable();
02363     
02364     System.out.print("Working on character classes.");
02365     for (Enumeration e=m_spec.m_nfa_states.elements(); e.hasMoreElements(); ) {
02366       CNfa nfa = (CNfa) e.nextElement();
02367       if (nfa.m_edge==CNfa.EMPTY || nfa.m_edge==CNfa.EPSILON)
02368         continue; // no discriminatory information.
02369       clsA.clearAll(); clsB.clearAll();
02370       for (int i=0; i<ccls.length; i++)
02371         if (nfa.m_edge==i || // edge labeled with a character
02372             nfa.m_edge==CNfa.CCL && nfa.m_set.contains(i)) // set of characters
02373           clsA.set(ccls[i]);
02374         else
02375           clsB.set(ccls[i]);
02376       // now figure out which character classes we need to split.
02377       clsA.and(clsB); // split the classes which show up on both sides of edge
02378       System.out.print(clsA.size()==0?".":":");
02379       if (clsA.size()==0) continue; // nothing to do.
02380       // and split them.
02381       h.clear(); // h will map old to new class name
02382       for (int i=0; i<ccls.length; i++)
02383         if (clsA.get(ccls[i])) // a split class
02384           if (nfa.m_edge==i ||
02385               nfa.m_edge==CNfa.CCL && nfa.m_set.contains(i)) { // on A side
02386             Integer split = new Integer(ccls[i]);
02387             if (!h.containsKey(split))
02388               h.put(split, new Integer(nextcls++)); // make new class
02389             ccls[i] = ((Integer)h.get(split)).intValue();
02390           }
02391     }
02392     System.out.println();
02393     System.out.println("NFA has "+nextcls+" distinct character classes.");
02394     
02395     this.mapped_charset_size = nextcls;
02396   }
02397 }
02398 
02399 /***************************************************************
02400   Class: CMinimize
02401  **************************************************************/
02402 class CMinimize
02403 {
02404   /***************************************************************
02405     Member Variables
02406     **************************************************************/
02407   CSpec m_spec;
02408   Vector m_group;
02409   int m_ingroup[];
02410 
02411   /***************************************************************
02412     Function: CMinimize
02413     Description: Constructor.
02414     **************************************************************/
02415   CMinimize 
02416     (
02417      )
02418       {
02419         reset();
02420       }
02421   
02422   /***************************************************************
02423     Function: reset
02424     Description: Resets member variables.
02425     **************************************************************/
02426   private void reset
02427     (
02428      )
02429       {
02430         m_spec = null;
02431         m_group = null;
02432         m_ingroup = null;
02433       }
02434 
02435   /***************************************************************
02436     Function: set
02437     Description: Sets member variables.
02438     **************************************************************/
02439   private void set
02440     (
02441      CSpec spec
02442      )
02443       {
02444         if (CUtility.DEBUG)
02445           {
02446             CUtility.ASSERT(null != spec);
02447           }
02448 
02449         m_spec = spec;
02450         m_group = null;
02451         m_ingroup = null;
02452       }
02453 
02454   /***************************************************************
02455     Function: min_dfa
02456     Description: High-level access function to module.
02457     **************************************************************/
02458   void min_dfa
02459     (
02460      CSpec spec
02461      )
02462       {
02463         set(spec);
02464 
02465         /* Remove redundant states. */
02466         minimize();
02467 
02468         /* Column and row compression. 
02469            Save accept states in auxilary vector. */
02470         reduce();
02471 
02472         reset();
02473       }
02474 
02475   /***************************************************************
02476     Function: col_copy
02477     Description: Copies source column into destination column.
02478     **************************************************************/
02479   private void col_copy
02480     (
02481      int dest,
02482      int src
02483      )
02484       {
02485         int n;
02486         int i;
02487         CDTrans dtrans;
02488 
02489         n = m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.size();
02490         for (i = 0; i < n; ++i)
02491           {
02492             dtrans = (CDTrans) m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.elementAt(i);
02493             dtrans.m_dtrans[dest] = dtrans.m_dtrans[src]; 
02494           }
02495       } 
02496         
02497   /***************************************************************
02498     Function: trunc_col
02499     Description: Truncates each column to the 'correct' length.
02500     **************************************************************/
02501   private void trunc_col
02502     (
02503      )
02504       {
02505         int n;
02506         int i;
02507         CDTrans dtrans;
02508 
02509         n = m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.size();
02510         for (i = 0; i < n; ++i)
02511           {
02512             int[] ndtrans = new int[m_spec.m_dtrans_ncols];
02513             dtrans = (CDTrans) m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.elementAt(i);
02514             System.arraycopy(dtrans.m_dtrans, 0, ndtrans, 0, ndtrans.length);
02515             dtrans.m_dtrans = ndtrans;
02516           }
02517       }
02518   /***************************************************************
02519     Function: row_copy
02520     Description: Copies source row into destination row.
02521     **************************************************************/
02522   private void row_copy
02523     (
02524      int dest,
02525      int src
02526      )
02527       {
02528         CDTrans dtrans;
02529 
02530         dtrans = (CDTrans) m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.elementAt(src);
02531         m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.setElementAt(dtrans,dest); 
02532       } 
02533         
02534   /***************************************************************
02535     Function: col_equiv
02536     Description: 
02537     **************************************************************/
02538   private boolean col_equiv
02539     (
02540      int col1,
02541      int col2
02542      )
02543       {
02544         int n;
02545         int i;
02546         CDTrans dtrans;
02547 
02548         n = m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.size();
02549         for (i = 0; i < n; ++i)
02550           {
02551             dtrans = (CDTrans) m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.elementAt(i);
02552             if (dtrans.m_dtrans[col1] != dtrans.m_dtrans[col2]) 
02553               {
02554                 return false;
02555               }
02556           }
02557         
02558         return true;
02559       }
02560 
02561   /***************************************************************
02562     Function: row_equiv
02563     Description: 
02564     **************************************************************/
02565   private boolean row_equiv
02566     (
02567      int row1,
02568      int row2
02569      )
02570       {
02571         int i;
02572         CDTrans dtrans1;
02573         CDTrans dtrans2;
02574 
02575         dtrans1 = (CDTrans) m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.elementAt(row1);
02576         dtrans2 = (CDTrans) m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.elementAt(row2);
02577         
02578         for (i = 0; i < m_spec.m_dtrans_ncols; ++i)
02579           {
02580             if (dtrans1.m_dtrans[i] != dtrans2.m_dtrans[i]) 
02581               {
02582                 return false;
02583               }
02584           }
02585         
02586         return true;
02587       }
02588 
02589   /***************************************************************
02590     Function: reduce
02591     Description: 
02592     **************************************************************/
02593   private void reduce
02594     (
02595      )
02596       {
02597         int i;
02598         int j;
02599         int k;
02600         int nrows;
02601         int reduced_ncols;
02602         int reduced_nrows;
02603         SparseBitSet set;
02604         CDTrans dtrans;
02605         int size;
02606 
02607         set = new SparseBitSet();
02608         
02609         /* Save accept nodes and anchor entries. */
02610         size = m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.size();
02611         m_spec.m_anchor_array = new int[size];
02612         m_spec.m_accept_vector = new Vector();
02613         for (i = 0; i < size; ++i)
02614           {
02615             dtrans = (CDTrans) m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.elementAt(i);
02616             m_spec.m_accept_vector.addElement(dtrans.m_accept);
02617             m_spec.m_anchor_array[i] = dtrans.m_anchor;
02618             dtrans.m_accept = null;
02619           }
02620         
02621         /* Allocate column map. */
02622         m_spec.m_col_map = new int[m_spec.m_dtrans_ncols];
02623         for (i = 0; i < m_spec.m_dtrans_ncols; ++i)
02624           {
02625             m_spec.m_col_map[i] = -1;
02626           }
02627 
02628         /* Process columns for reduction. */
02629         for (reduced_ncols = 0; ; ++reduced_ncols)
02630           {
02631             if (CUtility.DEBUG)
02632               {
02633                 for (i = 0; i < reduced_ncols; ++i)
02634                   {
02635                     CUtility.ASSERT(-1 != m_spec.m_col_map[i]);
02636                   }
02637               }
02638 
02639             for (i = reduced_ncols; i < m_spec.m_dtrans_ncols; ++i)
02640               {
02641                 if (-1 == m_spec.m_col_map[i])
02642                   {
02643                     break;
02644                   }
02645               }
02646 
02647             if (i >= m_spec.m_dtrans_ncols)
02648               {
02649                 break;
02650               }
02651 
02652             if (CUtility.DEBUG)
02653               {
02654                 CUtility.ASSERT(false == set.get(i));
02655                 CUtility.ASSERT(-1 == m_spec.m_col_map[i]);
02656               }
02657 
02658             set.set(i);
02659             
02660             m_spec.m_col_map[i] = reduced_ncols;
02661             
02662             /* UNDONE: Optimize by doing all comparisons in one batch. */
02663             for (j = i + 1; j < m_spec.m_dtrans_ncols; ++j)
02664               {
02665                 if (-1 == m_spec.m_col_map[j] && true == col_equiv(i,j))
02666                   {
02667                     m_spec.m_col_map[j] = reduced_ncols;
02668                   }
02669               }
02670           }
02671 
02672         /* Reduce columns. */
02673         k = 0;
02674         for (i = 0; i < m_spec.m_dtrans_ncols; ++i)
02675           {
02676             if (set.get(i))
02677               {
02678                 ++k;
02679 
02680                 set.clear(i);
02681                 
02682                 j = m_spec.m_col_map[i];
02683                 
02684                 if (CUtility.DEBUG)
02685                   {
02686                     CUtility.ASSERT(j <= i);
02687                   }
02688                 
02689                 if (j == i)
02690                   {
02691                     continue;
02692                   }
02693                 
02694                 col_copy(j,i);
02695               }
02696           }
02697         m_spec.m_dtrans_ncols = reduced_ncols;
02698         /* truncate m_dtrans at proper length (freeing extra) */
02699         trunc_col();
02700 
02701         if (CUtility.DEBUG)
02702           {
02703             CUtility.ASSERT(k == reduced_ncols);
02704           }
02705 
02706         /* Allocate row map. */
02707         nrows = m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.size();
02708         m_spec.m_row_map = new int[nrows];
02709         for (i = 0; i < nrows; ++i)
02710           {
02711             m_spec.m_row_map[i] = -1;
02712           }
02713 
02714         /* Process rows to reduce. */
02715         for (reduced_nrows = 0; ; ++reduced_nrows)
02716           {
02717             if (CUtility.DEBUG)
02718               {
02719                 for (i = 0; i < reduced_nrows; ++i)
02720                   {
02721                     CUtility.ASSERT(-1 != m_spec.m_row_map[i]);
02722                   }
02723               }
02724 
02725             for (i = reduced_nrows; i < nrows; ++i)
02726               {
02727                 if (-1 == m_spec.m_row_map[i])
02728                   {
02729                     break;
02730                   }
02731               }
02732 
02733             if (i >= nrows)
02734               {
02735                 break;
02736               }
02737 
02738             if (CUtility.DEBUG)
02739               {
02740                 CUtility.ASSERT(false == set.get(i));
02741                 CUtility.ASSERT(-1 == m_spec.m_row_map[i]);
02742               }
02743 
02744             set.set(i);
02745 
02746             m_spec.m_row_map[i] = reduced_nrows;
02747             
02748             /* UNDONE: Optimize by doing all comparisons in one batch. */
02749             for (j = i + 1; j < nrows; ++j)
02750               {
02751                 if (-1 == m_spec.m_row_map[j] && true == row_equiv(i,j))
02752                   {
02753                     m_spec.m_row_map[j] = reduced_nrows;
02754                   }
02755               }
02756           }
02757 
02758         /* Reduce rows. */
02759         k = 0;
02760         for (i = 0; i < nrows; ++i)
02761           {
02762             if (set.get(i))
02763               {
02764                 ++k;
02765 
02766                 set.clear(i);
02767                 
02768                 j = m_spec.m_row_map[i];
02769                 
02770                 if (CUtility.DEBUG)
02771                   {
02772                     CUtility.ASSERT(j <= i);
02773                   }
02774                 
02775                 if (j == i)
02776                   {
02777                     continue;
02778                   }
02779                 
02780                 row_copy(j,i);
02781               }
02782           }
02783         m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.setSize(reduced_nrows);
02784 
02785         if (CUtility.DEBUG)
02786           {
02787             /*System.out.println("k = " + k + "\nreduced_nrows = " + reduced_nrows + "");*/
02788             CUtility.ASSERT(k == reduced_nrows);
02789           }
02790       }
02791 
02792   /***************************************************************
02793     Function: fix_dtrans
02794     Description: Updates CDTrans table after minimization 
02795     using groups, removing redundant transition table states.
02796     **************************************************************/
02797   private void fix_dtrans
02798     (
02799      )
02800       {
02801         Vector new_vector;
02802         int i;
02803         int size;
02804         Vector dtrans_group;
02805         CDTrans first;
02806         int c;
02807 
02808         new_vector = new Vector();
02809 
02810         size = m_spec.m_state_dtrans.length;
02811         for (i = 0; i < size; ++i)
02812           {
02813             if (CDTrans.F != m_spec.m_state_dtrans[i])
02814               {
02815                 m_spec.m_state_dtrans[i] = m_ingroup[m_spec.m_state_dtrans[i]];
02816               }
02817           }
02818 
02819         size = m_group.size();
02820         for (i = 0; i < size; ++i)
02821           {
02822             dtrans_group = (Vector) m_group.elementAt(i);
02823             first = (CDTrans) dtrans_group.elementAt(0);
02824             new_vector.addElement(first);
02825 
02826             for (c = 0; c < m_spec.m_dtrans_ncols; ++c)
02827               {
02828                 if (CDTrans.F != first.m_dtrans[c])
02829                   {
02830                     first.m_dtrans[c] = m_ingroup[first.m_dtrans[c]];
02831                   }
02832               }
02833           }
02834 
02835         m_group = null;
02836         m_spec.m_dtrans_vector = new_vector;
02837       }
02838 
02839   /***************************************************************
02840     Function: minimize
02841     Description: Removes redundant transition table states.
02842     **************************************************************/
02843   private void minimize
02844     (
02845      )
02846       {
02847         Vector dtrans_group;
02848         Vector new_group;
02849         int i;
02850         int j;
02851         int old_group_count;
02852         int group_count;
02853         CDTrans next;
02854         CDTrans first;
02855         int goto_first;
02856         int goto_next;
02857         int c;
02858         int group_size;
02859         boolean added;
02860 
02861         init_groups();
02862 
02863         group_count = m_group.size();
02864         old_group_count = group_count - 1;
02865 
02866         while (old_group_count != group_count)
02867           {
02868             old_group_count = group_count;
02869 
02870             if (CUtility.DEBUG)
02871               {
02872                 CUtility.ASSERT(m_group.size() == group_count);
02873               }
02874 
02875             for (i = 0; i < group_count; ++i)
02876               {
02877                 dtrans_group = (Vector) m_group.elementAt(i);
02878 
02879                 group_size = dtrans_group.size();
02880                 if (group_size <= 1)
02881                   {
02882                     continue;
02883                   }
02884 
02885                 new_group = new Vector();
02886                 added = false;
02887                 
02888                 first = (CDTrans) dtrans_group.elementAt(0);
02889                 for (j = 1; j < group_size; ++j)
02890                   {
02891                     next = (CDTrans) dtrans_group.elementAt(j);
02892 
02893                     for (c = 0; c < m_spec.m_dtrans_ncols; ++c)
02894                       {
02895                         goto_first = first.m_dtrans[c];
02896                         goto_next = next.m_dtrans[c];
02897 
02898                         if (goto_first != goto_next
02899                             && (goto_first == CDTrans.F
02900                                 || goto_next == CDTrans.F
02901                                 || m_ingroup[goto_next] != m_ingroup[goto_first]))
02902                           {
02903                             if (CUtility.DEBUG)
02904                               {
02905                                 CUtility.ASSERT(dtrans_group.elementAt(j) == next);
02906                               }
02907                             
02908                             dtrans_group.removeElementAt(j);
02909                             --j;
02910                             --group_size;
02911                             new_group.addElement(next);
02912                             if (false == added)
02913                               {
02914                                 added = true;
02915                                 ++group_count;
02916                                 m_group.addElement(new_group);
02917                               }
02918                             m_ingroup[next.m_label] = m_group.size() - 1;
02919 
02920                             if (CUtility.DEBUG)
02921                               {
02922                                 CUtility.ASSERT(m_group.contains(new_group)
02923                                                 == true);
02924                                 CUtility.ASSERT(m_group.contains(dtrans_group)
02925                                                 == true);
02926                                 CUtility.ASSERT(dtrans_group.contains(first)
02927                                                 == true);
02928                                 CUtility.ASSERT(dtrans_group.contains(next)
02929                                                 == false);
02930                                 CUtility.ASSERT(new_group.contains(first)
02931                                                 == false);
02932                                 CUtility.ASSERT(new_group.contains(next)
02933                                                 == true);
02934                                 CUtility.ASSERT(dtrans_group.size() == group_size);
02935                                 CUtility.ASSERT(i == m_ingroup[first.m_label]);
02936                                 CUtility.ASSERT((m_group.size() - 1) 
02937                                                 == m_ingroup[next.m_label]);
02938                               }
02939 
02940                             break;
02941                           }
02942                       }
02943                   }
02944               }
02945           }
02946 
02947         System.out.println(m_group.size() + " states after removal of redundant states.");
02948 
02949         if (m_spec.m_verbose
02950             && true == CUtility.OLD_DUMP_DEBUG)
02951           {
02952             System.out.println();
02953             System.out.println("States grouped as follows after minimization");
02954             pgroups();
02955           }
02956 
02957         fix_dtrans();
02958       }
02959 
02960   /***************************************************************
02961     Function: init_groups
02962     Description:
02963     **************************************************************/
02964   private void init_groups
02965     (
02966      )
02967       {
02968         int i;
02969         int j;
02970         int group_count;
02971         int size;
02972         CAccept accept;
02973         CDTrans dtrans;
02974         Vector dtrans_group;
02975         CDTrans first;
02976         boolean group_found;
02977 
02978         m_group = new Vector();
02979         group_count = 0;
02980         
02981         size = m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.size();
02982         m_ingroup = new int[size];
02983         
02984         for (i = 0; i < size; ++i)
02985           {
02986             group_found = false;
02987             dtrans = (CDTrans) m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.elementAt(i);
02988 
02989             if (CUtility.DEBUG)
02990               {
02991                 CUtility.ASSERT(i == dtrans.m_label);
02992                 CUtility.ASSERT(false == group_found);
02993                 CUtility.ASSERT(group_count == m_group.size());
02994               }
02995             
02996             for (j = 0; j < group_count; ++j)
02997               {
02998                 dtrans_group = (Vector) m_group.elementAt(j);
02999                 
03000                 if (CUtility.DEBUG)
03001                   {
03002                     CUtility.ASSERT(false == group_found);
03003                     CUtility.ASSERT(0 < dtrans_group.size());
03004                   }
03005 
03006                 first = (CDTrans) dtrans_group.elementAt(0);
03007                 
03008                 if (CUtility.SLOW_DEBUG)
03009                   {
03010                     CDTrans check;
03011                     int k;
03012                     int s;
03013 
03014                     s = dtrans_group.size();
03015                     CUtility.ASSERT(0 < s);
03016 
03017                     for (k = 1; k < s; ++k)
03018                       {
03019                         check = (CDTrans) dtrans_group.elementAt(k);
03020                         CUtility.ASSERT(check.m_accept == first.m_accept);
03021                       }
03022                   }
03023 
03024                 if (first.m_accept == dtrans.m_accept)
03025                   {
03026                     dtrans_group.addElement(dtrans);
03027                     m_ingroup[i] = j;
03028                     group_found = true;
03029                     
03030                     if (CUtility.DEBUG)
03031                       {
03032                         CUtility.ASSERT(j == m_ingroup[dtrans.m_label]);
03033                       }
03034 
03035                     break;
03036                   }
03037               }
03038             
03039             if (false == group_found)
03040               {
03041                 dtrans_group = new Vector();
03042                 dtrans_group.addElement(dtrans);
03043                 m_ingroup[i] = m_group.size();
03044                 m_group.addElement(dtrans_group);
03045                 ++group_count;
03046               }
03047           }
03048         
03049         if (m_spec.m_verbose
03050             && true == CUtility.OLD_DUMP_DEBUG)
03051           {
03052             System.out.println("Initial grouping:");
03053             pgroups();
03054             System.out.println();
03055           }
03056       }
03057 
03058   /***************************************************************
03059     Function: pset
03060     **************************************************************/
03061   private void pset
03062     (
03063      Vector dtrans_group
03064      )
03065       {
03066         int i;
03067         int size;
03068         CDTrans dtrans;
03069 
03070         size = dtrans_group.size();
03071         for (i = 0; i < size; ++i)
03072           {
03073             dtrans = (CDTrans) dtrans_group.elementAt(i);
03074             System.out.print(dtrans.m_label + " ");
03075           }
03076       }
03077   
03078   /***************************************************************
03079     Function: pgroups
03080     **************************************************************/
03081   private void pgroups
03082     (
03083      )
03084       {
03085         int i;
03086         int dtrans_size;
03087         int group_size;
03088         
03089         group_size = m_group.size();
03090         for (i = 0; i < group_size; ++i)
03091           {
03092             System.out.print("\tGroup " + i + " {");
03093             pset((Vector) m_group.elementAt(i));
03094             System.out.println("}");
03095             System.out.println();
03096           }
03097         
03098         System.out.println();
03099         dtrans_size = m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.size();
03100         for (i = 0; i < dtrans_size; ++i)
03101           {
03102             System.out.println("\tstate " + i 
03103                                + " is in group " 
03104                                + m_ingroup[i]);
03105           }
03106       }
03107 }
03108 
03109 /***************************************************************
03110   Class: CNfa2Dfa
03111  **************************************************************/
03112 class CNfa2Dfa
03113 {
03114   /***************************************************************
03115     Member Variables
03116     **************************************************************/
03117   private CSpec m_spec;
03118   private int m_unmarked_dfa;
03119   private CLexGen m_lexGen;
03120 
03121   /***************************************************************
03122     Constants
03123     **************************************************************/
03124   private static final int NOT_IN_DSTATES = -1;
03125 
03126   /***************************************************************
03127     Function: CNfa2Dfa
03128     **************************************************************/
03129   CNfa2Dfa
03130     (
03131      )
03132       {
03133         reset();
03134       }
03135 
03136   /***************************************************************
03137     Function: set 
03138     Description: 
03139     **************************************************************/
03140   private void set
03141     (
03142      CLexGen lexGen,
03143      CSpec spec
03144      )
03145       {
03146         m_lexGen = lexGen;
03147         m_spec = spec;
03148         m_unmarked_dfa = 0;
03149       }
03150 
03151   /***************************************************************
03152     Function: reset 
03153     Description: 
03154     **************************************************************/
03155   private void reset
03156     (
03157      )
03158       {
03159         m_lexGen = null;
03160         m_spec = null;
03161         m_unmarked_dfa = 0;
03162       }
03163 
03164   /***************************************************************
03165     Function: make_dfa
03166     Description: High-level access function to module.
03167     **************************************************************/
03168   void make_dfa
03169     (
03170      CLexGen lexGen,
03171      CSpec spec
03172      )
03173       {
03174         int i;
03175 
03176         reset();
03177         set(lexGen,spec);
03178 
03179         make_dtrans();
03180         free_nfa_states();
03181 
03182         if (m_spec.m_verbose && true == CUtility.OLD_DUMP_DEBUG)
03183           {
03184             System.out.println(m_spec.m_dfa_states.size()
03185                                + " DFA states in original machine.");
03186           }
03187 
03188         free_dfa_states();
03189       }     
03190 
03191    /***************************************************************
03192     Function: make_dtrans
03193     Description: Creates uncompressed CDTrans transition table.
03194     **************************************************************/
03195   private void make_dtrans
03196     (
03197      )
03198      /* throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException*/
03199       {
03200         CDfa next;
03201         CDfa dfa;
03202         CBunch bunch;
03203         int i;
03204         int nextstate;
03205         int size;
03206         CDTrans dtrans;
03207         CNfa nfa;
03208         int istate;
03209         int nstates;
03210         
03211         System.out.print("Working on DFA states.");
03212 
03213         /* Reference passing type and initializations. */
03214         bunch = new CBunch();
03215         m_unmarked_dfa = 0;
03216 
03217         /* Allocate mapping array. */
03218         nstates = m_spec.m_state_rules.length;
03219         m_spec.m_state_dtrans = new int[nstates];
03220 
03221         for (istate = 0; nstates > istate; ++istate)
03222           {
03223             /* CSA bugfix: if we skip all zero size rules, then
03224                an specification with no rules produces an illegal
03225                lexer (0 states) instead of a lexer that rejects
03226                everything (1 nonaccepting state). [27-Jul-1999]
03227             if (0 == m_spec.m_state_rules[istate].size())
03228               {
03229                 m_spec.m_state_dtrans[istate] = CDTrans.F;
03230                 continue;
03231               }
03232             */
03233                 
03234             /* Create start state and initialize fields. */
03235             bunch.m_nfa_set = (Vector) m_spec.m_state_rules[istate].clone();
03236             sortStates(bunch.m_nfa_set);
03237             
03238             bunch.m_nfa_bit = new SparseBitSet();
03239             
03240             /* Initialize bit set. */
03241             size = bunch.m_nfa_set.size();
03242             for (i = 0; size > i; ++i)
03243               {
03244                 nfa = (CNfa) bunch.m_nfa_set.elementAt(i);
03245                 bunch.m_nfa_bit.set(nfa.m_label);
03246               }
03247             
03248             bunch.m_accept = null;
03249             bunch.m_anchor = CSpec.NONE;
03250             bunch.m_accept_index = CUtility.INT_MAX;
03251             
03252             e_closure(bunch);
03253             add_to_dstates(bunch);
03254             
03255             m_spec.m_state_dtrans[istate] = m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.size();
03256 
03257             /* Main loop of CDTrans creation. */
03258             while (null != (dfa = get_unmarked()))
03259               {
03260                 System.out.print(".");
03261                 System.out.flush();
03262                 
03263                 if (CUtility.DEBUG)
03264                   {
03265                     CUtility.ASSERT(false == dfa.m_mark);
03266                   }
03267 
03268                 /* Get first unmarked node, then mark it. */
03269                 dfa.m_mark = true;
03270                 
03271                 /* Allocate new CDTrans, then initialize fields. */
03272                 dtrans = new CDTrans(m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.size(),m_spec);
03273                 dtrans.m_accept = dfa.m_accept;
03274                 dtrans.m_anchor = dfa.m_anchor;
03275                 
03276                 /* Set CDTrans array for each character transition. */
03277                 for (i = 0; i < m_spec.m_dtrans_ncols; ++i)
03278                   {
03279                     if (CUtility.DEBUG)
03280                       {
03281                         CUtility.ASSERT(0 <= i);
03282                         CUtility.ASSERT(m_spec.m_dtrans_ncols > i);
03283                       }
03284                     
03285                     /* Create new dfa set by attempting character transition. */
03286                     move(dfa.m_nfa_set,dfa.m_nfa_bit,i,bunch);
03287                     if (null != bunch.m_nfa_set)
03288                       {
03289                         e_closure(bunch);
03290                       }
03291                     
03292                     if (CUtility.DEBUG)
03293                       {
03294                         CUtility.ASSERT((null == bunch.m_nfa_set 
03295                                          && null == bunch.m_nfa_bit)
03296                                         || (null != bunch.m_nfa_set 
03297                                             && null != bunch.m_nfa_bit));
03298                       }
03299                     
03300                     /* Create new state or set state to empty. */
03301                     if (null == bunch.m_nfa_set)
03302                       {
03303                         nextstate = CDTrans.F;
03304                       }
03305                     else 
03306                       {
03307                         nextstate = in_dstates(bunch);
03308                         
03309                         if (NOT_IN_DSTATES == nextstate)
03310                           {
03311                             nextstate = add_to_dstates(bunch);
03312                           }
03313                       }
03314                     
03315                     if (CUtility.DEBUG)
03316                       {
03317                         CUtility.ASSERT(nextstate < m_spec.m_dfa_states.size());
03318                       }
03319                     
03320                     dtrans.m_dtrans[i] = nextstate;
03321                   }
03322                 
03323                 if (CUtility.DEBUG)
03324                   {
03325                     CUtility.ASSERT(m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.size() == dfa.m_label);
03326                   }
03327                 
03328                 m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.addElement(dtrans);
03329               }
03330           }
03331 
03332         System.out.println();
03333       }
03334 
03335   /***************************************************************
03336     Function: free_dfa_states
03337     **************************************************************/  
03338   private void free_dfa_states
03339     (
03340      )
03341       {
03342         m_spec.m_dfa_states = null;
03343         m_spec.m_dfa_sets = null;
03344       }
03345 
03346   /***************************************************************
03347     Function: free_nfa_states
03348     **************************************************************/  
03349   private void free_nfa_states
03350     (
03351      )
03352       {
03353         /* UNDONE: Remove references to nfas from within dfas. */
03354         /* UNDONE: Don't free CAccepts. */
03355 
03356         m_spec.m_nfa_states = null;
03357         m_spec.m_nfa_start = null;
03358         m_spec.m_state_rules = null;
03359       }
03360 
03361   /***************************************************************
03362     Function: e_closure
03363     Description: Alters and returns input set.
03364     **************************************************************/
03365   private void e_closure
03366     (
03367      CBunch bunch
03368      )
03369       {
03370         Stack nfa_stack;
03371         int size;
03372         int i;
03373         CNfa state;
03374 
03375         /* Debug checks. */
03376         if (CUtility.DEBUG)
03377           {
03378             CUtility.ASSERT(null != bunch);
03379             CUtility.ASSERT(null != bunch.m_nfa_set);
03380             CUtility.ASSERT(null != bunch.m_nfa_bit);
03381           }
03382 
03383         bunch.m_accept = null;
03384         bunch.m_anchor = CSpec.NONE;
03385         bunch.m_accept_index = CUtility.INT_MAX;
03386         
03387         /* Create initial stack. */
03388         nfa_stack = new Stack();
03389         size = bunch.m_nfa_set.size();
03390         for (i = 0; i < size; ++i)
03391           {
03392             state = (CNfa) bunch.m_nfa_set.elementAt(i);
03393             
03394             if (CUtility.DEBUG)
03395               {
03396                 CUtility.ASSERT(bunch.m_nfa_bit.get(state.m_label));
03397               }
03398 
03399             nfa_stack.push(state);
03400           }
03401 
03402         /* Main loop. */
03403         while (false == nfa_stack.empty())
03404           {
03405             state = (CNfa) nfa_stack.pop();
03406             
03407             if (CUtility.OLD_DUMP_DEBUG)
03408               {
03409                 if (null != state.m_accept)
03410                   {
03411                     System.out.println("Looking at accepting state " + state.m_label
03412                                        + " with <"
03413                                        + (new String(state.m_accept.m_action,0,
03414                                                      state.m_accept.m_action_read))
03415                                        + ">");
03416                   }
03417               }
03418 
03419             if (null != state.m_accept 
03420                 && state.m_label < bunch.m_accept_index)
03421               {
03422                 bunch.m_accept_index = state.m_label;
03423                 bunch.m_accept = state.m_accept;
03424                 bunch.m_anchor = state.m_anchor;
03425 
03426                 if (CUtility.OLD_DUMP_DEBUG)
03427                   {
03428                     System.out.println("Found accepting state " + state.m_label
03429                                        + " with <"
03430                                        + (new String(state.m_accept.m_action,0,
03431                                                      state.m_accept.m_action_read))
03432                                        + ">");
03433                   }
03434 
03435                 if (CUtility.DEBUG)
03436                   {
03437                     CUtility.ASSERT(null != bunch.m_accept);
03438                     CUtility.ASSERT(CSpec.NONE == bunch.m_anchor
03439                                     || 0 != (bunch.m_anchor & CSpec.END)
03440                                     || 0 != (bunch.m_anchor & CSpec.START));
03441                   }
03442               }
03443 
03444             if (CNfa.EPSILON == state.m_edge)
03445               {
03446                 if (null != state.m_next)
03447                   {
03448                     if (false == bunch.m_nfa_set.contains(state.m_next))
03449                       {
03450                         if (CUtility.DEBUG)
03451                           {
03452                             CUtility.ASSERT(false == bunch.m_nfa_bit.get(state.m_next.m_label));
03453                           }
03454                         
03455                         bunch.m_nfa_bit.set(state.m_next.m_label);
03456                         bunch.m_nfa_set.addElement(state.m_next);
03457                         nfa_stack.push(state.m_next);
03458                       }
03459                   }
03460 
03461                 if (null != state.m_next2)
03462                   {
03463                     if (false == bunch.m_nfa_set.contains(state.m_next2))
03464                       {
03465                         if (CUtility.DEBUG)
03466                           {
03467                             CUtility.ASSERT(false == bunch.m_nfa_bit.get(state.m_next2.m_label));
03468                           }
03469                         
03470                         bunch.m_nfa_bit.set(state.m_next2.m_label);
03471                         bunch.m_nfa_set.addElement(state.m_next2);
03472                         nfa_stack.push(state.m_next2);
03473                       }
03474                   }
03475               }
03476           }
03477 
03478         if (null != bunch.m_nfa_set)
03479           {
03480             sortStates(bunch.m_nfa_set);
03481           }
03482 
03483         return;
03484       }
03485 
03486   /***************************************************************
03487     Function: move
03488     Description: Returns null if resulting NFA set is empty.
03489     **************************************************************/
03490   void move
03491     (
03492      Vector nfa_set,
03493      SparseBitSet nfa_bit,
03494      int b,
03495      CBunch bunch
03496      )
03497       {
03498         int size;
03499         int index;
03500         CNfa state;
03501         
03502         bunch.m_nfa_set = null;
03503         bunch.m_nfa_bit = null;
03504 
03505         size = nfa_set.size();
03506         for (index = 0; index < size; ++index)
03507           {
03508             state = (CNfa) nfa_set.elementAt(index);
03509             
03510             if (b == state.m_edge
03511                 || (CNfa.CCL == state.m_edge
03512                     && true == state.m_set.contains(b)))
03513               {
03514                 if (null == bunch.m_nfa_set)
03515                   {
03516                     if (CUtility.DEBUG)
03517                       {
03518                         CUtility.ASSERT(null == bunch.m_nfa_bit);
03519                       }
03520                     
03521                     bunch.m_nfa_set = new Vector();
03522                     /*bunch.m_nfa_bit 
03523                         = new SparseBitSet(m_spec.m_nfa_states.size());*/
03524                     bunch.m_nfa_bit = new SparseBitSet();
03525                   }
03526 
03527                 bunch.m_nfa_set.addElement(state.m_next);
03528                 /*System.out.println("Size of bitset: " + bunch.m_nfa_bit.size());
03529                 System.out.println("Reference index: " + state.m_next.m_label);
03530                 System.out.flush();*/
03531                 bunch.m_nfa_bit.set(state.m_next.m_label);
03532               }
03533           }
03534         
03535         if (null != bunch.m_nfa_set)
03536           {
03537             if (CUtility.DEBUG)
03538               {
03539                 CUtility.ASSERT(null != bunch.m_nfa_bit);
03540               }
03541             
03542             sortStates(bunch.m_nfa_set);
03543           }
03544 
03545         return;
03546       }
03547 
03548   /***************************************************************
03549     Function: sortStates
03550     **************************************************************/
03551   private void sortStates
03552     (
03553      Vector nfa_set
03554      )
03555       {
03556         CNfa elem;
03557         int begin;
03558         int size;
03559         int index;
03560         int value;
03561         int smallest_index;
03562         int smallest_value;
03563         CNfa begin_elem;
03564 
03565         size = nfa_set.size();
03566         for (begin = 0; begin < size; ++begin)
03567           {
03568             elem = (CNfa) nfa_set.elementAt(begin);
03569             smallest_value = elem.m_label;
03570             smallest_index = begin;
03571 
03572             for (index = begin + 1; index < size; ++index)
03573               {
03574                 elem = (CNfa) nfa_set.elementAt(index);
03575                 value = elem.m_label;
03576 
03577                 if (value < smallest_value)
03578                   {
03579                     smallest_index = index;
03580                     smallest_value = value;
03581                   }
03582               }
03583 
03584             begin_elem = (CNfa) nfa_set.elementAt(begin);
03585             elem = (CNfa) nfa_set.elementAt(smallest_index);
03586             nfa_set.setElementAt(elem,begin);
03587             nfa_set.setElementAt(begin_elem,smallest_index);
03588           }
03589 
03590         if (CUtility.OLD_DEBUG)
03591           {
03592             System.out.print("NFA vector indices: ");  
03593             
03594             for (index = 0; index < size; ++index)
03595               {
03596                 elem = (CNfa) nfa_set.elementAt(index);
03597                 System.out.print(elem.m_label + " ");
03598               }
03599             System.out.println();
03600           }     
03601 
03602         return;
03603       }
03604 
03605   /***************************************************************
03606     Function: get_unmarked
03607     Description: Returns next unmarked DFA state.
03608     **************************************************************/
03609   private CDfa get_unmarked
03610     (
03611      )
03612       {
03613         int size;
03614         CDfa dfa;
03615 
03616         size = m_spec.m_dfa_states.size();
03617         while (m_unmarked_dfa < size)
03618           {
03619             dfa = (CDfa) m_spec.m_dfa_states.elementAt(m_unmarked_dfa);
03620 
03621             if (false == dfa.m_mark)
03622               {
03623                 if (CUtility.OLD_DUMP_DEBUG)
03624                   {
03625                     System.out.print("*");
03626                     System.out.flush();
03627                   }
03628 
03629                 if (m_spec.m_verbose && true == CUtility.OLD_DUMP_DEBUG)
03630                   {
03631                     System.out.println("---------------");
03632                     System.out.print("working on DFA state " 
03633                                      + m_unmarked_dfa
03634                                      + " = NFA states: ");
03635                     m_lexGen.print_set(dfa.m_nfa_set);
03636                     System.out.println();
03637                   }
03638 
03639                 return dfa;
03640               }
03641 
03642             ++m_unmarked_dfa;
03643           }
03644 
03645         return null;
03646       }
03647   
03648   /***************************************************************
03649     function: add_to_dstates
03650     Description: Takes as input a CBunch with details of
03651     a dfa state that needs to be created.
03652     1) Allocates a new dfa state and saves it in 
03653     the appropriate CSpec vector.
03654     2) Initializes the fields of the dfa state
03655     with the information in the CBunch.
03656     3) Returns index of new dfa.
03657     **************************************************************/
03658   private int add_to_dstates
03659     (
03660      CBunch bunch
03661      )
03662       {
03663         CDfa dfa;
03664         
03665         if (CUtility.DEBUG)
03666           {
03667             CUtility.ASSERT(null != bunch.m_nfa_set);
03668             CUtility.ASSERT(null != bunch.m_nfa_bit);
03669             CUtility.ASSERT(null != bunch.m_accept 
03670                             || CSpec.NONE == bunch.m_anchor);
03671           }
03672 
03673         /* Allocate, passing CSpec so dfa label can be set. */
03674         dfa = CAlloc.newCDfa(m_spec);
03675         
03676         /* Initialize fields, including the mark field. */
03677         dfa.m_nfa_set = (Vector) bunch.m_nfa_set.clone();
03678         dfa.m_nfa_bit = (SparseBitSet) bunch.m_nfa_bit.clone();
03679         dfa.m_accept = bunch.m_accept;
03680         dfa.m_anchor = bunch.m_anchor;
03681         dfa.m_mark = false;
03682         
03683         /* Register dfa state using BitSet in CSpec Hashtable. */
03684         m_spec.m_dfa_sets.put(dfa.m_nfa_bit,dfa);
03685         /*registerCDfa(dfa);*/
03686 
03687         if (CUtility.OLD_DUMP_DEBUG)
03688           {
03689             System.out.print("Registering set : ");
03690             m_lexGen.print_set(dfa.m_nfa_set);
03691             System.out.println();
03692           }
03693 
03694         return dfa.m_label;
03695       }
03696 
03697   /***************************************************************
03698     Function: in_dstates
03699     **************************************************************/
03700   private int in_dstates
03701     (
03702      CBunch bunch
03703      )
03704       {
03705         CDfa dfa;
03706         
03707         if (CUtility.OLD_DEBUG)
03708           {
03709             System.out.print("Looking for set : ");
03710             m_lexGen.print_set(bunch.m_nfa_set);
03711           }
03712 
03713         dfa = (CDfa) m_spec.m_dfa_sets.get(bunch.m_nfa_bit);
03714 
03715         if (null != dfa)
03716           {
03717             if (CUtility.OLD_DUMP_DEBUG)
03718               {
03719                 System.out.println(" FOUND!");
03720               }
03721             
03722             return dfa.m_label;
03723           }
03724 
03725         if (CUtility.OLD_DUMP_DEBUG)
03726           {
03727             System.out.println(" NOT FOUND!");
03728           }
03729         return NOT_IN_DSTATES;
03730       }
03731 
03732 }
03733 
03734 /***************************************************************
03735   Class: CAlloc
03736   **************************************************************/
03737 class CAlloc
03738 {
03739   /***************************************************************
03740     Function: newCDfa
03741     **************************************************************/
03742   static CDfa newCDfa
03743     (
03744      CSpec spec
03745      )
03746       {
03747         CDfa dfa;
03748         
03749         dfa = new CDfa(spec.m_dfa_states.size());
03750         spec.m_dfa_states.addElement(dfa);
03751 
03752         return dfa;
03753       }
03754 
03755   /***************************************************************
03756     Function: newCNfaPair
03757     Description: 
03758     **************************************************************/
03759   static CNfaPair newCNfaPair
03760     (
03761      )
03762       {
03763         CNfaPair pair = new CNfaPair();
03764         
03765         return pair;
03766       }
03767   /***************************************************************
03768     Function: newNLPair
03769     Description: return a new CNfaPair that matches a new 
03770                  line: (\r\n?|[\n\uu2028\uu2029])
03771                  Added by CSA 8-Aug-1999, updated 10-Aug-1999
03772     **************************************************************/
03773   static CNfaPair newNLPair(CSpec spec) {
03774     CNfaPair pair = newCNfaPair();
03775     pair.m_end=newCNfa(spec); // newline accepting state
03776     pair.m_start=newCNfa(spec); // new state with two epsilon edges
03777     pair.m_start.m_next = newCNfa(spec);
03778     pair.m_start.m_next.m_edge = CNfa.CCL;
03779     pair.m_start.m_next.m_set = new CSet();
03780     pair.m_start.m_next.m_set.add('\n');
03781     if (spec.m_dtrans_ncols-CSpec.NUM_PSEUDO > 2029) {
03782       pair.m_start.m_next.m_set.add(2028); /*U+2028 is LS, the line separator*/
03783       pair.m_start.m_next.m_set.add(2029); /*U+2029 is PS, the paragraph sep.*/
03784     }
03785     pair.m_start.m_next.m_next = pair.m_end; // accept '\n', U+2028, or U+2029
03786     pair.m_start.m_next2 = newCNfa(spec);
03787     pair.m_start.m_next2.m_edge = '\r';
03788     pair.m_start.m_next2.m_next = newCNfa(spec);
03789     pair.m_start.m_next2.m_next.m_next = pair.m_end; // accept '\r';
03790     pair.m_start.m_next2.m_next.m_next2 = newCNfa(spec);
03791     pair.m_start.m_next2.m_next.m_next2.m_edge = '\n';
03792     pair.m_start.m_next2.m_next.m_next2.m_next = pair.m_end; // accept '\r\n';
03793     return pair;
03794   }
03795 
03796   /***************************************************************
03797     Function: newCNfa
03798     Description: 
03799     **************************************************************/
03800   static CNfa newCNfa
03801     (
03802      CSpec spec
03803      )
03804       {
03805         CNfa p;
03806 
03807         /* UNDONE: Buffer this? */
03808 
03809         p = new CNfa();
03810         
03811         /*p.m_label = spec.m_nfa_states.size();*/
03812         spec.m_nfa_states.addElement(p);
03813         p.m_edge = CNfa.EPSILON;
03814         
03815         return p;
03816       }
03817 }
03818 
03819 /***************************************************************
03820   Class: Main
03821   Description: Top-level lexical analyzer generator function.
03822  **************************************************************/
03823 public class Main
03824 {
03825   /***************************************************************
03826     Function: main
03827     **************************************************************/
03828   public static void main
03829     (
03830      String arg[]
03831      )
03832     throws java.io.IOException
03833       {
03834         CLexGen lg;
03835 
03836         if (arg.length < 1)
03837           {
03838             System.out.println("Usage: JLex.Main <filename>");
03839             return;
03840           }
03841 
03842         /* Note: For debuging, it may be helpful to remove the try/catch
03843            block and permit the Exception to propagate to the top level. 
03844            This gives more information. */
03845         try 
03846           {     
03847             lg = new CLexGen(arg[0]);
03848             lg.generate();
03849           }
03850         catch (Error e)
03851           {
03852             System.out.println(e.getMessage());
03853           }
03854       }
03855 }    
03856
