05413   /***************************************************************
05414     Function: userDeclare
05415     Description:
05416     **************************************************************/
05417   private void userDeclare
05418     (
05419      )
05420       throws java.io.IOException
05421         {
05422           int elem;
05423           
05424           if (CUtility.DEBUG)
05425             {
05426               CUtility.ASSERT(null != this);
05427               CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_outstream);
05428               CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_input);
05429               CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_tokens);
05430               CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_spec);
05431             }
05432 
05433           if (m_input.m_eof_reached)
05434             {
05435               /* End-of-file. */
05436               CError.parse_error(CError.E_EOF,
05437                                  m_input.m_line_number);
05438             }
05439 
05440           while (false == m_input.getLine())
05441             {
05442               /* Look for double percent. */
05443               if (2 <= m_input.m_line_read 
05444                   && '%' == m_input.m_line[0] 
05445                   && '%' == m_input.m_line[1])
05446                 {
05447                   /* Mess around with line. */
05448                   m_input.m_line_read -= 2;
05449                   System.arraycopy(m_input.m_line, 2,
05450                                    m_input.m_line, 0, m_input.m_line_read);
05451 
05452                   m_input.m_pushback_line = true;
05453                   /* Check for and discard empty line. */
05454                   if (0 == m_input.m_line_read 
05455                       || '\n' == m_input.m_line[0])
05456                     {
05457                       m_input.m_pushback_line = false;
05458                     }
05459 
05460                   return;
05461                 }
05462 
05463               if (0 == m_input.m_line_read)
05464                 {
05465                   continue;
05466                 }
05467 
05468               if ('%' == m_input.m_line[0])
05469                 {
05470                   /* Special lex declarations. */
05471                   if (1 >= m_input.m_line_read)
05472                     {
05473                       CError.parse_error(CError.E_DIRECT,
05474                                          m_input.m_line_number);
05475                       continue;
05476                     }
05477 
05478                   switch (m_input.m_line[1])
05479                     {
05480                     case '{':
05481                       if (0 == CUtility.charncmp(m_input.m_line,
05482                                                  0,
05483                                                  m_class_code_dir,
05484                                                  0,
05485                                                  m_class_code_dir.length - 1))
05486                         {
05487                           m_spec.m_class_code = packCode(m_class_code_dir,
05488                                                          m_class_code_end_dir,
05489                                                          m_spec.m_class_code,
05490                                                          m_spec.m_class_read,
05491                                                          CLASS_CODE);
05492                           break;
05493                         }
05494               
05495                       /* Bad directive. */
05496                       CError.parse_error(CError.E_DIRECT,
05497                                          m_input.m_line_number);
05498                       break;
05499 
05500                     case 'c':
05501                       if (0 == CUtility.charncmp(m_input.m_line,
05502                                                  0,
05503                                                  m_char_dir,
05504                                                  0,
05505                                                  m_char_dir.length - 1))
05506                         {
05507                           /* Set line counting to ON. */
05508                           m_input.m_line_index = m_char_dir.length;
05509                           m_spec.m_count_chars = true;
05510                           break;
05511                         }       
05512                       else if (0 == CUtility.charncmp(m_input.m_line,
05513                                                       0,
05514                                                       m_class_dir, 
05515                                                       0,
05516                                                       m_class_dir.length - 1))
05517                         {
05518                           m_input.m_line_index = m_class_dir.length;
05519                           m_spec.m_class_name = getName();
05520                           break;
05521                         }
05522                       else if (0 == CUtility.charncmp(m_input.m_line,
05523                                                       0,
05524                                                       m_cup_dir,
05525                                                       0,
05526                                                       m_cup_dir.length - 1))
05527                         {
05528                           /* Set Java CUP compatibility to ON. */
05529                           m_input.m_line_index = m_cup_dir.length;
05530                           m_spec.m_cup_compatible = true;
05531                           // this is what %cup does: [CSA, 27-Jul-1999]
05532                           m_spec.m_implements_name =
05533                               "java_cup.runtime.Scanner".toCharArray();
05534                           m_spec.m_function_name =
05535                               "next_token".toCharArray();
05536                           m_spec.m_type_name =
05537                               "java_cup.runtime.Symbol".toCharArray();
05538                           break;
05539                         }
05540               
05541                       /* Bad directive. */
05542                       CError.parse_error(CError.E_DIRECT,
05543                                          m_input.m_line_number);
05544                       break;
05545                       
05546                     case 'e':
05547                       if (0 == CUtility.charncmp(m_input.m_line,
05548                                                  0,
05549                                                  m_eof_code_dir,
05550                                                  0,
05551                                                  m_eof_code_dir.length - 1))
05552                         {
05553                           m_spec.m_eof_code = packCode(m_eof_code_dir,
05554                                                        m_eof_code_end_dir,
05555                                                        m_spec.m_eof_code,
05556                                                        m_spec.m_eof_read,
05557                                                        EOF_CODE);
05558                           break;
05559                         }
05560                       else if (0 == CUtility.charncmp(m_input.m_line,
05561                                                       0,
05562                                                       m_eof_value_code_dir,
05563                                                       0,
05564                                                       m_eof_value_code_dir.length - 1))
05565                         {
05566                           m_spec.m_eof_value_code = packCode(m_eof_value_code_dir,
05567                                                              m_eof_value_code_end_dir,
05568                                                              m_spec.m_eof_value_code,
05569                                                              m_spec.m_eof_value_read,
05570                                                              EOF_VALUE_CODE);
05571                           break;
05572                         }
05573                       else if (0 == CUtility.charncmp(m_input.m_line,
05574                                                       0,
05575                                                       m_eof_throw_code_dir,
05576                                                       0,
05577                                                       m_eof_throw_code_dir.length - 1))
05578                         {
05579                           m_spec.m_eof_throw_code = packCode(m_eof_throw_code_dir,
05580                                                        m_eof_throw_code_end_dir,
05581                                                        m_spec.m_eof_throw_code,
05582                                                        m_spec.m_eof_throw_read,
05583                                                        EOF_THROW_CODE);
05584                           break;
05585                         }
05586               
05587                       /* Bad directive. */
05588                       CError.parse_error(CError.E_DIRECT,
05589                                          m_input.m_line_number);
05590                       break;
05591 
05592                     case 'f':
05593                       if (0 == CUtility.charncmp(m_input.m_line,
05594                                                  0,
05595                                                  m_function_dir,
05596                                                  0,
05597                                                  m_function_dir.length - 1))
05598                         {
05599                           /* Set line counting to ON. */
05600                           m_input.m_line_index = m_function_dir.length;
05601                           m_spec.m_function_name = getName();
05602                           break;
05603                         }
05604                       else if (0 == CUtility.charncmp(m_input.m_line,
05605                                                       0,
05606                                                       m_full_dir,
05607                                                       0,
05608                                                       m_full_dir.length - 1))
05609                         {
05610                           m_input.m_line_index = m_full_dir.length;
05611                           m_spec.m_dtrans_ncols = CUtility.MAX_EIGHT_BIT + 1;
05612                           break;
05613                         }
05614 
05615                       /* Bad directive. */
05616                       CError.parse_error(CError.E_DIRECT,
05617                                          m_input.m_line_number);
05618                       break;
05619 
05620                     case 'i':
05621                       if (0 == CUtility.charncmp(m_input.m_line,
05622                                                  0,
05623                                                  m_integer_dir,
05624                                                  0,
05625                                                  m_integer_dir.length - 1))
05626                         {
05627                           /* Set line counting to ON. */
05628                           m_input.m_line_index = m_integer_dir.length;
05629                           m_spec.m_integer_type = true;
05630                           break;
05631                         }
05632                       else if (0 == CUtility.charncmp(m_input.m_line,
05633                                                       0,
05634                                                       m_intwrap_dir,
05635                                                       0,
05636                                                       m_intwrap_dir.length - 1))
05637                         {
05638                           /* Set line counting to ON. */
05639                           m_input.m_line_index = m_integer_dir.length;
05640                           m_spec.m_intwrap_type = true;
05641                           break;
05642                         }
05643                       else if (0 == CUtility.charncmp(m_input.m_line,
05644                                                       0,
05645                                                       m_init_code_dir,
05646                                                       0,
05647                                                       m_init_code_dir.length - 1))
05648                         {
05649                           m_spec.m_init_code = packCode(m_init_code_dir,
05650                                                         m_init_code_end_dir,
05651                                                         m_spec.m_init_code,
05652                                                         m_spec.m_init_read,
05653                                                         INIT_CODE);
05654                           break;
05655                         }
05656                       else if (0 == CUtility.charncmp(m_input.m_line,
05657                                                       0,
05658                                                       m_init_throw_code_dir,
05659                                                       0,
05660                                                       m_init_throw_code_dir.length - 1))
05661                         {
05662                           m_spec.m_init_throw_code = packCode(m_init_throw_code_dir,
05663                                                        m_init_throw_code_end_dir,
05664                                                        m_spec.m_init_throw_code,
05665                                                        m_spec.m_init_throw_read,
05666                                                        INIT_THROW_CODE);
05667                           break;
05668                         }
05669                       else if (0 == CUtility.charncmp(m_input.m_line,
05670                                                       0,
05671                                                       m_implements_dir, 
05672                                                       0,
05673                                                       m_implements_dir.length - 1))
05674                         {
05675                           m_input.m_line_index = m_implements_dir.length;
05676                           m_spec.m_implements_name = getName();
05677                           break;
05678                         }
05679                       else if (0 == CUtility.charncmp(m_input.m_line,
05680                                                       0,
05681                                                       m_ignorecase_dir,
05682                                                       0,
05683                                                       m_ignorecase_dir.length-1))
05684                         {
05685                           /* Set m_ignorecase to ON. */
05686                           m_input.m_line_index = m_ignorecase_dir.length;
05687                           m_spec.m_ignorecase = true;
05688                           break;
05689                         }
05690 
05691                       /* Bad directive. */
05692                       CError.parse_error(CError.E_DIRECT,
05693                                          m_input.m_line_number);
05694                       break;
05695 
05696                     case 'l':
05697                       if (0 == CUtility.charncmp(m_input.m_line,
05698                                                  0,
05699                                                  m_line_dir,
05700                                                  0,
05701                                                  m_line_dir.length - 1))
05702                         {
05703                           /* Set line counting to ON. */
05704                           m_input.m_line_index = m_line_dir.length;
05705                           m_spec.m_count_lines = true;
05706                           break;
05707                         }
05708 
05709                       /* Bad directive. */
05710                       CError.parse_error(CError.E_DIRECT,
05711                                          m_input.m_line_number);
05712                       break;
05713 
05714                     case 'n':
05715                       if (0 == CUtility.charncmp(m_input.m_line,
05716                                                  0,
05717                                                  m_notunix_dir,
05718                                                  0,
05719                                                  m_notunix_dir.length - 1))
05720                         {
05721                           /* Set line counting to ON. */
05722                           m_input.m_line_index = m_notunix_dir.length;
05723                           m_spec.m_unix = false;
05724                           break;
05725                         }
05726 
05727                       /* Bad directive. */
05728                       CError.parse_error(CError.E_DIRECT,
05729                                          m_input.m_line_number);
05730                       break;
05731 
05732                     case 'p':
05733                       if (0 == CUtility.charncmp(m_input.m_line,
05734                                                  0,
05735                                                  m_public_dir,
05736                                                  0,
05737                                                  m_public_dir.length - 1))
05738                         {
05739                           /* Set public flag. */
05740                           m_input.m_line_index = m_public_dir.length;
05741                           m_spec.m_public = true;
05742                           break;
05743                         }
05744 
05745                       /* Bad directive. */
05746                       CError.parse_error(CError.E_DIRECT,
05747                                          m_input.m_line_number);
05748                       break;
05749 
05750                     case 's':
05751                       if (0 == CUtility.charncmp(m_input.m_line,
05752                                                  0,
05753                                                  m_state_dir,
05754                                                  0,
05755                                                  m_state_dir.length - 1))
05756                         {
05757                           /* Recognize state list. */
05758                           m_input.m_line_index = m_state_dir.length;
05759                           saveStates();
05760                           break;
05761                         }
05762 
05763                       /* Undefined directive. */
05764                       CError.parse_error(CError.E_DIRECT,
05765                                          m_input.m_line_number);
05766                       break;
05767                      
05768                     case 't':
05769                       if (0 == CUtility.charncmp(m_input.m_line,
05770                                                  0,
05771                                                  m_type_dir,
05772                                                  0,
05773                                                  m_type_dir.length - 1))
05774                         {
05775                           /* Set Java CUP compatibility to ON. */
05776                           m_input.m_line_index = m_type_dir.length;
05777                           m_spec.m_type_name = getName();
05778                           break;
05779                         }
05780 
05781                       /* Undefined directive. */
05782                       CError.parse_error(CError.E_DIRECT,
05783                                          m_input.m_line_number);
05784                       break;
05785 
05786                     case 'u':
05787                       if (0 == CUtility.charncmp(m_input.m_line,
05788                                                  0,
05789                                                  m_unicode_dir,
05790                                                  0,
05791                                                  m_unicode_dir.length - 1))
05792                         {
05793                           m_input.m_line_index = m_unicode_dir.length;
05794                           m_spec.m_dtrans_ncols= CUtility.MAX_SIXTEEN_BIT + 1;
05795                           break;
05796                         }
05797 
05798                       /* Bad directive. */
05799                       CError.parse_error(CError.E_DIRECT,
05800                                          m_input.m_line_number);
05801                       break;
05802 
05803                     case 'y':
05804                       if (0 == CUtility.charncmp(m_input.m_line,
05805                                                  0,
05806                                                  m_yyeof_dir,
05807                                                  0,
05808                                                  m_yyeof_dir.length - 1))
05809                         {
05810                           m_input.m_line_index = m_yyeof_dir.length;
05811                           m_spec.m_yyeof = true;
05812                           break;
05813                         } else if (0 == CUtility.charncmp(m_input.m_line,
05814                                                           0,
05815                                                           m_yylex_throw_code_dir,
05816                                                           0,
05817                                                           m_yylex_throw_code_dir.length - 1))
05818                         {
05819                           m_spec.m_yylex_throw_code = packCode(m_yylex_throw_code_dir,
05820                                                                m_yylex_throw_code_end_dir,
05821                                                        m_spec.m_yylex_throw_code,
05822                                                        m_spec.m_yylex_throw_read,
05823                                                        YYLEX_THROW_CODE);
05824                           break;
05825                         }
05826 
05827 
05828                       /* Bad directive. */
05829                       CError.parse_error(CError.E_DIRECT,
05830                                          m_input.m_line_number);
05831                       break;
05832 
05833                     default:
05834                       /* Undefined directive. */
05835                       CError.parse_error(CError.E_DIRECT,
05836                                          m_input.m_line_number);
05837                       break;
05838                     }
05839                 }
05840               else
05841                 {
05842                   /* Regular expression macro. */
05843                   m_input.m_line_index = 0;
05844                   saveMacro();
05845                 }
05846 
05847               if (CUtility.OLD_DEBUG)
05848                 {
05849                   System.out.println("Line number " 
05850                                      + m_input.m_line_number + ":"); 
05851                   System.out.print(new String(m_input.m_line,
05852                                               0,m_input.m_line_read));
05853                 }
05854             }
05855         }
05856          
05857   /***************************************************************
05858     Function: userRules
05859     Description: Processes third section of JLex 
05860     specification and creates minimized transition table.
05861     **************************************************************/
05862   private void userRules
05863     (
05864      )
05865       throws java.io.IOException
05866       {
05867         int code;
05868 
05869         if (false == m_init_flag)
05870           {
05871             CError.parse_error(CError.E_INIT,0);
05872           }
05873 
05874         if (CUtility.DEBUG)
05875           {
05876             CUtility.ASSERT(null != this);
05877             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_outstream);
05878             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_input);
05879             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_tokens);
05880             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_spec);
05881           }
05882 
05883         /* UNDONE: Need to handle states preceding rules. */
05884         
05885         if (m_spec.m_verbose)
05886           {
05887             System.out.println("Creating NFA machine representation.");
05888           }
05889         m_makeNfa.allocate_BOL_EOF(m_spec);
05890         m_makeNfa.thompson(this,m_spec,m_input);
05891         
05892         m_simplifyNfa.simplify(m_spec);
05893 
05894         /*print_nfa();*/
05895 
05896         if (CUtility.DEBUG)
05897           {
05898             CUtility.ASSERT(END_OF_INPUT == m_spec.m_current_token);
05899           }
05900 
05901         if (m_spec.m_verbose)
05902           {
05903             System.out.println("Creating DFA transition table.");
05904           }
05905         m_nfa2dfa.make_dfa(this,m_spec);
05906 
05907         if (CUtility.FOODEBUG) {
05908           print_header();
05909         }
05910 
05911         if (m_spec.m_verbose)
05912           {
05913             System.out.println("Minimizing DFA transition table.");
05914           }
05915         m_minimize.min_dfa(m_spec);
05916       }
05917 
05918   /***************************************************************
05919     Function: printccl
05920     Description: Debugging routine that outputs readable form
05921     of character class.
05922     **************************************************************/
05923   private void printccl
05924     (
05925      CSet set
05926      )
05927       {
05928         int i;
05929         
05930         System.out.print(" [");
05931         for (i = 0; i < m_spec.m_dtrans_ncols; ++i)
05932           {
05933             if (set.contains(i))
05934               {
05935                 System.out.print(interp_int(i));
05936               }
05937           }
05938         System.out.print(']');
05939       }
05940 
05941   /***************************************************************
05942     Function: plab
05943     Description:
05944     **************************************************************/
05945   private String plab
05946     (
05947      CNfa state
05948      )
05949       {
05950         int index;
05951         
05952         if (null == state)
05953           {
05954             return (new String("--"));
05955           }
05956 
05957         index = m_spec.m_nfa_states.indexOf(state);
05958         
05959         return ((new Integer(index)).toString());
05960       }
05961 
05962   /***************************************************************
05963     Function: interp_int
05964     Description:
05965     **************************************************************/
05966   private String interp_int
05967     (
05968      int i
05969      )
05970       {
05971         switch (i)
05972           {
05973           case (int) '\b':
05974             return (new String("\\b"));
05975 
05976           case (int) '\t':
05977             return (new String("\\t"));
05978 
05979           case (int) '\n':
05980             return (new String("\\n"));
05981 
05982           case (int) '\f':
05983             return (new String("\\f"));
05984 
05985           case (int) '\r':
05986             return (new String("\\r"));
05987             
05988           case (int) ' ':
05989             return (new String("\\ "));
05990             
05991           default:
05992             return ((new Character((char) i)).toString());
05993           }
05994       }
05995 
05996   /***************************************************************
05997     Function: print_nfa
05998     Description:
05999     **************************************************************/
06000   void print_nfa
06001     (
06002      )
06003       {
06004         int elem;
06005         CNfa nfa;
06006         int size;
06007         Enumeration states;
06008         Integer index;
06009         int i;
06010         int j;
06011         int vsize;
06012         String state;
06013      
06014         System.out.println("--------------------- NFA -----------------------");
06015         
06016         size = m_spec.m_nfa_states.size();
06017         for (elem = 0; elem < size; ++elem)
06018           {
06019             nfa = (CNfa) m_spec.m_nfa_states.elementAt(elem);
06020             
06021             System.out.print("Nfa state " + plab(nfa) + ": ");
06022             
06023             if (null == nfa.m_next)
06024               {
06025                 System.out.print("(TERMINAL)");
06026               }
06027             else
06028               {
06029                 System.out.print("--> " + plab(nfa.m_next));
06030                 System.out.print("--> " + plab(nfa.m_next2));
06031                 
06032                 switch (nfa.m_edge)
06033                   {
06034                   case CNfa.CCL:
06035                     printccl(nfa.m_set);
06036                     break;
06037 
06038                   case CNfa.EPSILON:
06039                     System.out.print(" EPSILON ");
06040                     break; 
06041                     
06042                   default:
06043                     System.out.print(" " + interp_int(nfa.m_edge));
06044                     break;
06045                   }
06046               }
06047 
06048             if (0 == elem)
06049               {
06050                 System.out.print(" (START STATE)");
06051               }
06052             
06053             if (null != nfa.m_accept)
06054               {
06055                 System.out.print(" accepting " 
06056                                  + ((0 != (nfa.m_anchor & CSpec.START)) ? "^" : "")
06057                                  + "<" 
06058                                  + (new String(nfa.m_accept.m_action,0,
06059                                                nfa.m_accept.m_action_read))
06060                                  + ">"
06061                                  + ((0 != (nfa.m_anchor & CSpec.END)) ? "$" : ""));
06062               }
06063 
06064             System.out.println();
06065           }
06066 
06067         states = m_spec.m_states.keys();
06068         while (states.hasMoreElements())
06069           {
06070             state = (String) states.nextElement();
06071             index = (Integer) m_spec.m_states.get(state);
06072 
06073             if (CUtility.DEBUG)
06074               {
06075                 CUtility.ASSERT(null != state);
06076                 CUtility.ASSERT(null != index);
06077               }
06078 
06079             System.out.println("State \"" + state 
06080                                + "\" has identifying index " 
06081                                + index.toString() + ".");
06082             System.out.print("\tStart states of matching rules: ");
06083             
06084             i = index.intValue();
06085             vsize = m_spec.m_state_rules[i].size();
06086             
06087             for (j = 0; j < vsize; ++j)
06088               {
06089                 nfa = (CNfa) m_spec.m_state_rules[i].elementAt(j);
06090 
06091                 System.out.print(m_spec.m_nfa_states.indexOf(nfa) + " ");
06092               }
06093 
06094             System.out.println();
06095           }
06096 
06097         System.out.println("-------------------- NFA ----------------------");
06098       }
06099 
06100   /***************************************************************
06101     Function: getStates
06102     Description: Parses the state area of a rule,
06103     from the beginning of a line.
06104     < state1, state2 ... > regular_expression { action }
06105     Returns null on only EOF.  Returns all_states, 
06106     initialied properly to correspond to all states,
06107     if no states are found.
06108     Special Notes: This function treats commas as optional
06109     and permits states to be spread over multiple lines.
06110     **************************************************************/
06111   private SparseBitSet all_states = null;
06112   SparseBitSet getStates
06113     (
06114      )
06115       throws java.io.IOException
06116       {
06117         int start_state;
06118         int count_state;
06119         SparseBitSet states;
06120         String name;
06121         Integer index;
06122         int i;
06123         int size;
06124         
06125         if (CUtility.DEBUG)
06126           {
06127             CUtility.ASSERT(null != this);
06128             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_outstream);
06129             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_input);
06130             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_tokens);
06131             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_spec);
06132           }
06133 
06134         states = null;
06135 
06136         /* Skip white space. */
06137         while (CUtility.isspace(m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index]))
06138           {
06139             ++m_input.m_line_index;
06140     
06141             while (m_input.m_line_index >= m_input.m_line_read)
06142               {
06143                 /* Must just be an empty line. */
06144                 if (m_input.getLine())
06145                   {
06146                     /* EOF found. */
06147                     return null;
06148                   }
06149               }
06150           }
06151 
06152         /* Look for states. */
06153         if ('<' == m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index])
06154           {
06155             ++m_input.m_line_index;
06156            
06157             states = new SparseBitSet();
06158 
06159             /* Parse states. */
06160             while (true)
06161               {
06162                 /* We may have reached the end of the line. */
06163                 while (m_input.m_line_index >= m_input.m_line_read)
06164                   {
06165                     if (m_input.getLine())
06166                       {
06167                         /* EOF found. */
06168                         CError.parse_error(CError.E_EOF,m_input.m_line_number);
06169                         return states;
06170                       }
06171                   }
06172 
06173                 while (true)
06174                   {
06175                     /* Skip white space. */
06176                     while (CUtility.isspace(m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index]))
06177                       {
06178                         ++m_input.m_line_index;
06179                         
06180                         while (m_input.m_line_index >= m_input.m_line_read)
06181                           {
06182                             if (m_input.getLine())
06183                               {
06184                                 /* EOF found. */
06185                                 CError.parse_error(CError.E_EOF,m_input.m_line_number);
06186                                 return states;
06187                               }
06188                           }
06189                       }
06190                     
06191                     if (',' != m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index])
06192                       {
06193                         break;
06194                       }
06195 
06196                     ++m_input.m_line_index;
06197                   }
06198 
06199                 if ('>' == m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index])
06200                   {
06201                     ++m_input.m_line_index;
06202                     if (m_input.m_line_index < m_input.m_line_read)
06203                       {
06204                         m_advance_stop = true;
06205                       }
06206                     return states;
06207                   }
06208 
06209                 /* Read in state name. */
06210                 start_state = m_input.m_line_index;
06211                 while (false == CUtility.isspace(m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index])
06212                        && ',' != m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index]
06213                        && '>' != m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index])
06214                   {
06215                     ++m_input.m_line_index;
06216 
06217                     if (m_input.m_line_index >= m_input.m_line_read)
06218                       {
06219                         /* End of line means end of state name. */
06220                         break;
06221                       }
06222                   }
06223                 count_state = m_input.m_line_index - start_state;
06224 
06225                 /* Save name after checking definition. */
06226                 name = new String(m_input.m_line,
06227                                   start_state,
06228                                   count_state);
06229                 index = (Integer) m_spec.m_states.get(name);
06230                 if (null == index)
06231                   {
06232                     /* Uninitialized state. */
06233                     System.out.println("Uninitialized State Name: " + name);
06234                     CError.parse_error(CError.E_STATE,m_input.m_line_number);
06235                   }
06236                 states.set(index.intValue());
06237               }
06238           }
06239         
06240         if (null == all_states)
06241           {
06242             all_states = new SparseBitSet();
06243 
06244             size = m_spec.m_states.size();
06245             for (i = 0; i < size; ++i)
06246               {
06247                 all_states.set(i);
06248               }
06249           }
06250         
06251         if (m_input.m_line_index < m_input.m_line_read)
06252           {
06253             m_advance_stop = true;
06254           }
06255         return all_states;
06256       }
06257 
06258   /********************************************************
06259     Function: expandMacro
06260     Description: Returns false on error, true otherwise. 
06261     *******************************************************/
06262   private boolean expandMacro
06263     (
06264      )
06265       {
06266         int elem;
06267         int start_macro;
06268         int end_macro;
06269         int start_name;
06270         int count_name;
06271         String def;
06272         int def_elem;
06273         String name;
06274         char replace[];
06275         int rep_elem;
06276 
06277         if (CUtility.DEBUG)
06278           {
06279             CUtility.ASSERT(null != this);
06280             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_outstream);
06281             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_input);
06282             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_tokens);
06283             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_spec);
06284           }
06285 
06286         /* Check for macro. */
06287         if ('{' != m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index])
06288           {
06289             CError.parse_error(CError.E_INTERNAL,m_input.m_line_number);
06290             return ERROR;
06291           }
06292         
06293         start_macro = m_input.m_line_index;
06294         elem = m_input.m_line_index + 1;
06295         if (elem >= m_input.m_line_read)
06296           {
06297             CError.impos("Unfinished macro name");
06298             return ERROR;
06299           }
06300         
06301         /* Get macro name. */
06302         start_name = elem;
06303         while ('}' != m_input.m_line[elem])
06304           {
06305             ++elem;
06306             if (elem >= m_input.m_line_read)
06307               {
06308                 CError.impos("Unfinished macro name at line " 
06309                              + m_input.m_line_number);
06310                 return ERROR;
06311               }
06312           }
06313         count_name = elem - start_name;
06314         end_macro = elem;
06315 
06316         /* Check macro name. */
06317         if (0 == count_name)
06318           {
06319             CError.impos("Nonexistent macro name");
06320             return ERROR;
06321           }
06322 
06323         /* Debug checks. */
06324         if (CUtility.DEBUG)
06325           {
06326             CUtility.ASSERT(0 < count_name);
06327           }
06328 
06329         /* Retrieve macro definition. */
06330         name = new String(m_input.m_line,start_name,count_name);
06331         def = (String) m_spec.m_macros.get(name);
06332         if (null == def)
06333           {
06334             /*CError.impos("Undefined macro \"" + name + "\".");*/
06335             System.out.println("Error: Undefined macro \"" + name + "\".");
06336             CError.parse_error(CError.E_NOMAC, m_input.m_line_number);
06337             return ERROR;
06338           }
06339         if (CUtility.OLD_DUMP_DEBUG)
06340           {
06341             System.out.println("expanded escape: " + def);
06342           }
06343                 
06344         /* Replace macro in new buffer,
06345            beginning by copying first part of line buffer. */
06346         replace = new char[m_input.m_line.length];
06347         for (rep_elem = 0; rep_elem < start_macro; ++rep_elem)
06348           {
06349             replace[rep_elem] = m_input.m_line[rep_elem];
06350 
06351             if (CUtility.DEBUG)
06352               {
06353                 CUtility.ASSERT(rep_elem < replace.length);
06354               }
06355           }
06356         
06357         /* Copy macro definition. */
06358         if (rep_elem >= replace.length)
06359           {
06360             replace = CUtility.doubleSize(replace);
06361           }
06362         for (def_elem = 0; def_elem < def.length(); ++def_elem)
06363           {
06364             replace[rep_elem] = def.charAt(def_elem);
06365             
06366             ++rep_elem;
06367             if (rep_elem >= replace.length)
06368               {
06369                 replace = CUtility.doubleSize(replace);
06370               }
06371           }
06372 
06373         /* Copy last part of line. */
06374         if (rep_elem >= replace.length)
06375           {
06376             replace = CUtility.doubleSize(replace);
06377           }
06378         for (elem = end_macro + 1; elem < m_input.m_line_read; ++elem)
06379           {
06380             replace[rep_elem] = m_input.m_line[elem];
06381             
06382             ++rep_elem;
06383             if (rep_elem >= replace.length)
06384               {
06385                 replace = CUtility.doubleSize(replace);
06386               }
06387           } 
06388         
06389         /* Replace buffer. */
06390         m_input.m_line = replace;
06391         m_input.m_line_read = rep_elem;
06392         
06393         if (CUtility.OLD_DEBUG)
06394           {
06395             System.out.println(new String(m_input.m_line,0,m_input.m_line_read));
06396           }
06397         return NOT_ERROR;
06398       }
06399 
06400   /***************************************************************
06401     Function: saveMacro
06402     Description: Saves macro definition of form:
06403     macro_name = macro_definition
06404     **************************************************************/
06405   private void saveMacro
06406     (
06407      )
06408       {
06409         int elem;
06410         int start_name;
06411         int count_name;
06412         int start_def;
06413         int count_def;
06414         boolean saw_escape;
06415         boolean in_quote;
06416         boolean in_ccl;
06417 
06418         if (CUtility.DEBUG)
06419           {
06420             CUtility.ASSERT(null != this);
06421             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_outstream);
06422             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_input);
06423             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_tokens);
06424             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_spec);
06425           }
06426 
06427         /* Macro declarations are of the following form:
06428            macro_name macro_definition */
06429 
06430         elem = 0;
06431         
06432         /* Skip white space preceding macro name. */
06433         while (CUtility.isspace(m_input.m_line[elem]))
06434           {
06435             ++elem;
06436             if (elem >= m_input.m_line_read)
06437               {
06438                 /* End of line has been reached,
06439                    and line was found to be empty. */
06440                 return;
06441               }
06442           }
06443 
06444         /* Read macro name. */
06445         start_name = elem;
06446         while (false == CUtility.isspace(m_input.m_line[elem])
06447                && '=' != m_input.m_line[elem])
06448           {
06449             ++elem;
06450             if (elem >= m_input.m_line_read)
06451               {
06452                 /* Macro name but no associated definition. */
06453                 CError.parse_error(CError.E_MACDEF,m_input.m_line_number);
06454               }
06455           }
06456         count_name = elem - start_name;
06457 
06458         /* Check macro name. */
06459         if (0 == count_name) 
06460           {
06461             /* Nonexistent macro name. */
06462             CError.parse_error(CError.E_MACDEF,m_input.m_line_number);
06463           }
06464 
06465         /* Skip white space between name and definition. */
06466         while (CUtility.isspace(m_input.m_line[elem]))
06467           {
06468             ++elem;
06469             if (elem >= m_input.m_line_read)
06470               {
06471                 /* Macro name but no associated definition. */
06472                 CError.parse_error(CError.E_MACDEF,m_input.m_line_number);
06473               }
06474           }
06475 
06476         if ('=' == m_input.m_line[elem])
06477           {
06478             ++elem;
06479             if (elem >= m_input.m_line_read)
06480               {
06481                 /* Macro name but no associated definition. */
06482                 CError.parse_error(CError.E_MACDEF,m_input.m_line_number);
06483               }
06484           }
06485         else /* macro definition without = */
06486                 CError.parse_error(CError.E_MACDEF,m_input.m_line_number);
06487 
06488         /* Skip white space between name and definition. */
06489         while (CUtility.isspace(m_input.m_line[elem]))
06490           {
06491             ++elem;
06492             if (elem >= m_input.m_line_read)
06493               {
06494                 /* Macro name but no associated definition. */
06495                 CError.parse_error(CError.E_MACDEF,m_input.m_line_number);
06496               }
06497           }
06498 
06499         /* Read macro definition. */
06500         start_def = elem;
06501         in_quote = false;
06502         in_ccl = false;
06503         saw_escape = false;
06504         while (false == CUtility.isspace(m_input.m_line[elem])
06505                || true == in_quote
06506                || true == in_ccl
06507                || true == saw_escape)
06508           {
06509             if ('\"' == m_input.m_line[elem] && false == saw_escape)
06510               {
06511                 in_quote = !in_quote;
06512               }
06513             
06514             if ('\\' == m_input.m_line[elem] && false == saw_escape)
06515               {
06516                 saw_escape = true;
06517               }
06518             else
06519               {
06520                 saw_escape = false;
06521               }
06522             if (false == saw_escape && false == in_quote) { // CSA, 24-jul-99
06523               if ('[' == m_input.m_line[elem] && false == in_ccl)
06524                 in_ccl = true;
06525               if (']' == m_input.m_line[elem] && true == in_ccl)
06526                 in_ccl = false;
06527             }
06528 
06529             ++elem;
06530             if (elem >= m_input.m_line_read)
06531               {
06532                 /* End of line. */
06533                 break;
06534               }
06535           }
06536         count_def = elem - start_def;
06537           
06538         /* Check macro definition. */
06539         if (0 == count_def) 
06540           {
06541             /* Nonexistent macro name. */
06542             CError.parse_error(CError.E_MACDEF,m_input.m_line_number);
06543           }
06544 
06545         /* Debug checks. */
06546         if (CUtility.DEBUG)
06547           {
06548             CUtility.ASSERT(0 < count_def);
06549             CUtility.ASSERT(0 < count_name);
06550             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_spec.m_macros);
06551           }
06552 
06553         if (CUtility.OLD_DEBUG)
06554           {
06555             System.out.println("macro name \""
06556                                + new String(m_input.m_line,start_name,count_name)
06557                                + "\".");
06558             System.out.println("macro definition \""
06559                                + new String(m_input.m_line,start_def,count_def)
06560                                + "\".");
06561           }
06562 
06563         /* Add macro name and definition to table. */
06564         m_spec.m_macros.put(new String(m_input.m_line,start_name,count_name),
06565                             new String(m_input.m_line,start_def,count_def));
06566       }
06567 
06568   /***************************************************************
06569     Function: saveStates
06570     Description: Takes state declaration and makes entries
06571     for them in state hashtable in CSpec structure.
06572     State declaration should be of the form:
06573     %state name0[, name1, name2 ...]
06574     (But commas are actually optional as long as there is 
06575     white space in between them.)
06576     **************************************************************/
06577   private void saveStates
06578     (
06579      )
06580       {
06581         int start_state;
06582         int count_state;
06583 
06584         if (CUtility.DEBUG)
06585           {
06586             CUtility.ASSERT(null != this);
06587             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_outstream);
06588             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_input);
06589             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_tokens);
06590             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_spec);
06591           }
06592 
06593         /* EOF found? */
06594         if (m_input.m_eof_reached)
06595           {
06596             return;
06597           }
06598 
06599         /* Debug checks. */
06600         if (CUtility.DEBUG)
06601           {
06602             CUtility.ASSERT('%' == m_input.m_line[0]);
06603             CUtility.ASSERT('s' == m_input.m_line[1]);
06604             CUtility.ASSERT(m_input.m_line_index <= m_input.m_line_read);
06605             CUtility.ASSERT(0 <= m_input.m_line_index);
06606             CUtility.ASSERT(0 <= m_input.m_line_read);
06607           }
06608 
06609         /* Blank line?  No states? */
06610         if (m_input.m_line_index >= m_input.m_line_read)
06611           {
06612             return;
06613           }
06614 
06615         while (m_input.m_line_index < m_input.m_line_read)
06616           {
06617             if (CUtility.OLD_DEBUG)
06618               {
06619                 System.out.println("line read " + m_input.m_line_read 
06620                                    + "\tline index = " + m_input.m_line_index);
06621               }
06622 
06623             /* Skip white space. */
06624             while (CUtility.isspace(m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index]))
06625               {
06626                 ++m_input.m_line_index;
06627                 if (m_input.m_line_index >= m_input.m_line_read)
06628                   {
06629                     /* No more states to be found. */
06630                     return;
06631                   }
06632               }
06633             
06634             /* Look for state name. */
06635             start_state = m_input.m_line_index;
06636             while (false == CUtility.isspace(m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index])
06637                    && ',' != m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index])
06638               {
06639                 ++m_input.m_line_index;
06640                 if (m_input.m_line_index >= m_input.m_line_read)
06641                   {
06642                     /* End of line and end of state name. */
06643                     break;
06644                   }
06645               }
06646             count_state = m_input.m_line_index - start_state;
06647 
06648             if (CUtility.OLD_DEBUG)
06649               {
06650                 System.out.println("State name \"" 
06651                                    + new String(m_input.m_line,start_state,count_state)
06652                                    + "\".");
06653                 System.out.println("Integer index \"" 
06654                                    + m_spec.m_states.size()
06655                                    + "\".");
06656               }
06657 
06658             /* Enter new state name, along with unique index. */
06659             m_spec.m_states.put(new String(m_input.m_line,start_state,count_state),
06660                                 new Integer(m_spec.m_states.size()));
06661             
06662             /* Skip comma. */
06663             if (',' == m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index])
06664               {
06665                 ++m_input.m_line_index;
06666                 if (m_input.m_line_index >= m_input.m_line_read)
06667                   {
06668                     /* End of line. */
06669                     return;
06670                   }
06671               }
06672           }
06673       }
06674 
06675   /********************************************************
06676     Function: expandEscape
06677     Description: Takes escape sequence and returns
06678     corresponding character code.
06679     *******************************************************/
06680   private char expandEscape
06681     (
06682      )
06683       {
06684         char r;
06685         
06686         /* Debug checks. */
06687         if (CUtility.DEBUG)
06688           {
06689             CUtility.ASSERT(m_input.m_line_index < m_input.m_line_read);
06690             CUtility.ASSERT(0 < m_input.m_line_read);
06691             CUtility.ASSERT(0 <= m_input.m_line_index);
06692           }
06693 
06694         if ('\\' != m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index])
06695           {
06696             ++m_input.m_line_index;
06697             return m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index - 1];
06698           }
06699         else
06700           {
06701             boolean unicode_escape = false;
06702             ++m_input.m_line_index;
06703             switch (m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index])
06704               {
06705               case 'b':
06706                 ++m_input.m_line_index;
06707                 return '\b';
06708 
06709               case 't':
06710                 ++m_input.m_line_index;
06711                 return '\t';
06712 
06713               case 'n':
06714                 ++m_input.m_line_index;
06715                 return '\n';
06716 
06717               case 'f':
06718                 ++m_input.m_line_index;
06719                 return '\f';
06720 
06721               case 'r':
06722                 ++m_input.m_line_index;
06723                 return '\r';
06724 
06725               case '^':
06726                 ++m_input.m_line_index;
06727                 r=Character.toUpperCase(m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index]);
06728                 if (r<'@' || r>'Z') // non-fatal
06729                     CError.parse_error(CError.E_BADCTRL,m_input.m_line_number);
06730                 r = (char) (r - '@');
06731                 ++m_input.m_line_index;
06732                 return r;
06733 
06734               case 'u':
06735                 unicode_escape = true;
06736               case 'x':
06737                 ++m_input.m_line_index;
06738                 r = 0;
06739                 for (int i=0; i<(unicode_escape?4:2); i++)
06740                   if (CUtility.ishexdigit(m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index]))
06741                     {
06742                       r = (char) (r << 4);
06743                       r = (char) (r | CUtility.hex2bin(m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index]));
06744                       ++m_input.m_line_index;
06745                     }
06746                   else break;
06747                 
06748                 return r;
06749                 
06750               default:
06751                 if (false == CUtility.isoctdigit(m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index]))
06752                   {
06753                     r = m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index];
06754                     ++m_input.m_line_index;
06755                   }
06756                 else
06757                   {
06758                     r = 0;
06759                     for (int i=0; i<3; i++)
06760                       if (CUtility.isoctdigit(m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index]))
06761                         {
06762                           r = (char) (r << 3);
06763                           r = (char) (r | CUtility.oct2bin(m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index]));
06764                           ++m_input.m_line_index;
06765                         }
06766                       else break;
06767                   }
06768                 return r;
06769               }
06770           }
06771       }
06772         
06773   /********************************************************
06774     Function: packAccept
06775     Description: Packages and returns CAccept 
06776     for action next in input stream.
06777     *******************************************************/
06778   CAccept packAccept
06779     (
06780      )
06781       throws java.io.IOException
06782       {
06783         CAccept accept;
06784         char action[];
06785         int action_index;
06786         int brackets;
06787         boolean insinglequotes;
06788         boolean indoublequotes;
06789         boolean instarcomment;
06790         boolean inslashcomment;
06791         boolean escaped;
06792         boolean slashed;
06793 
06794         action = new char[BUFFER_SIZE];
06795         action_index = 0;
06796 
06797         if (CUtility.DEBUG)
06798           {
06799             CUtility.ASSERT(null != this);
06800             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_outstream);
06801             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_input);
06802             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_tokens);
06803             CUtility.ASSERT(null != m_spec);
06804           }
06805 
06806         /* Get a new line, if needed. */
06807         while (m_input.m_line_index >= m_input.m_line_read)
06808           {
06809             if (m_input.getLine())
06810               {
06811                 CError.parse_error(CError.E_EOF,m_input.m_line_number);
06812                 return null;
06813               }
06814           }
06815         
06816         /* Look for beginning of action. */
06817         while (CUtility.isspace(m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index]))
06818           {
06819             ++m_input.m_line_index;
06820             
06821             /* Get a new line, if needed. */
06822             while (m_input.m_line_index >= m_input.m_line_read)
06823               {
06824                 if (m_input.getLine())
06825                   {
06826                     CError.parse_error(CError.E_EOF,m_input.m_line_number);
06827                     return null;
06828                   }
06829               }
06830           }
06831         
06832         /* Look for brackets. */
06833         if ('{' != m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index])
06834           {
06835             CError.parse_error(CError.E_BRACE,m_input.m_line_number); 
06836           }
06837         
06838         /* Copy new line into action buffer. */
06839         brackets = 0;
06840         insinglequotes = indoublequotes = inslashcomment = instarcomment =
06841         escaped  = slashed = false;
06842         while (true)
06843           {
06844             action[action_index] = m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index];
06845 
06846             /* Look for quotes. */
06847             if ((insinglequotes || indoublequotes) && escaped)
06848                 escaped=false; // only protects one char, but this is enough.
06849             else if ((insinglequotes || indoublequotes) &&
06850                      '\\' == m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index])
06851                 escaped=true;
06852             else if (!(insinglequotes || inslashcomment || instarcomment) &&
06853                      '\"' == m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index])
06854                 indoublequotes=!indoublequotes; // unescaped double quote.
06855             else if (!(indoublequotes || inslashcomment || instarcomment) &&
06856                      '\'' == m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index])
06857                 insinglequotes=!insinglequotes; // unescaped single quote.
06858             /* Look for comments. */
06859             if (instarcomment) { // inside "/*" comment; look for "*/"
06860                 if (slashed && '/' == m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index])
06861                     instarcomment = slashed = false;
06862                 else // note that inside a star comment, slashed means starred
06863                     slashed = ('*' == m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index]);
06864             } else if (!inslashcomment && !insinglequotes && !indoublequotes) {
06865                 // not in comment, look for /* or //
06866                 inslashcomment = 
06867                     (slashed && '/' == m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index]);
06868                 instarcomment =
06869                     (slashed && '*' == m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index]);
06870                 slashed = ('/' == m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index]);
06871             }
06872 
06873             /* Look for brackets. */
06874             if (!insinglequotes && !indoublequotes &&
06875                 !instarcomment && !inslashcomment) {
06876               if ('{' == m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index])
06877                 {
06878                   ++brackets;
06879                 }
06880               else if ('}' == m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index])
06881                 {
06882                   --brackets;
06883                 
06884                   if (0 == brackets)
06885                     {
06886                       ++action_index;
06887                       ++m_input.m_line_index;
06888 
06889                       break;
06890                     }
06891                 }
06892             }
06893             
06894             ++action_index;
06895             /* Double the buffer size, if needed. */
06896             if (action_index >= action.length)
06897               {
06898                 action = CUtility.doubleSize(action);
06899               }
06900 
06901             ++m_input.m_line_index;
06902             /* Get a new line, if needed. */
06903             while (m_input.m_line_index >= m_input.m_line_read)
06904               {
06905                 inslashcomment = slashed = false;
06906                 if (insinglequotes || indoublequotes) { // non-fatal
06907                     CError.parse_error(CError.E_NEWLINE,m_input.m_line_number);
06908                     insinglequotes = indoublequotes = false;
06909                 }
06910                 if (m_input.getLine())
06911                   {
06912                     CError.parse_error(CError.E_SYNTAX,m_input.m_line_number);
06913                     return null;
06914                   }
06915               }
06916           }
06917             
06918         accept = new CAccept(action,action_index,m_input.m_line_number);
06919 
06920         if (CUtility.DEBUG)
06921           {
06922             CUtility.ASSERT(null != accept);
06923           }
06924 
06925         if (CUtility.DESCENT_DEBUG)
06926           {
06927             System.out.print("Accepting action:");
06928             System.out.println(new String(accept.m_action,0,accept.m_action_read));
06929           }
06930 
06931         return accept;
06932       }
06933 
06934   /********************************************************
06935     Function: advance
06936     Description: Returns code for next token.
06937     *******************************************************/
06938   private boolean m_advance_stop = false;
06939   int advance
06940     (
06941      )
06942       throws java.io.IOException
06943       {
06944         boolean saw_escape = false;
06945         Integer code;
06946         
06947         /*if (m_input.m_line_index > m_input.m_line_read) {
06948           System.out.println("m_input.m_line_index = " + m_input.m_line_index);
06949           System.out.println("m_input.m_line_read = " + m_input.m_line_read);
06950           CUtility.ASSERT(m_input.m_line_index <= m_input.m_line_read);
06951         }*/
06952 
06953         if (m_input.m_eof_reached)
06954           {
06955             /* EOF has already been reached,
06956                so return appropriate code. */
06957 
06958             m_spec.m_current_token = END_OF_INPUT;
06959             m_spec.m_lexeme = '\0';
06960             return m_spec.m_current_token;
06961           }
06962 
06963         /* End of previous regular expression?
06964            Refill line buffer? */
06965         if (EOS == m_spec.m_current_token
06966             /* ADDED */
06967             || m_input.m_line_index >= m_input.m_line_read)
06968             /* ADDED */
06969           {
06970             if (m_spec.m_in_quote)
06971               {
06972                 CError.parse_error(CError.E_SYNTAX,m_input.m_line_number);
06973               }
06974             
06975             while (true)
06976               {
06977                 if (false == m_advance_stop  
06978                     || m_input.m_line_index >= m_input.m_line_read)
06979                   {
06980                     if (m_input.getLine())
06981                       {
06982                         /* EOF has already been reached,
06983                            so return appropriate code. */
06984                         
06985                         m_spec.m_current_token = END_OF_INPUT;
06986                         m_spec.m_lexeme = '\0';
06987                         return m_spec.m_current_token;
06988                       }
06989                     m_input.m_line_index = 0;
06990                   }
06991                 else
06992                   {
06993                     m_advance_stop = false;
06994                   }
06995 
06996                 while (m_input.m_line_index < m_input.m_line_read
06997                        && true == CUtility.isspace(m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index]))
06998                   {
06999                     ++m_input.m_line_index;
07000                   }
07001                 
07002                 if (m_input.m_line_index < m_input.m_line_read)
07003                   {
07004                     break;
07005                   }
07006               }
07007           }
07008         
07009         if (CUtility.DEBUG) {
07010           CUtility.ASSERT(m_input.m_line_index <= m_input.m_line_read);
07011         }
07012 
07013         while (true)
07014           {
07015             if (false == m_spec.m_in_quote
07016                 && '{' == m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index])
07017               {
07018                 if (false == expandMacro())
07019                   {
07020                     break;
07021                   }
07022                
07023                 if (m_input.m_line_index >= m_input.m_line_read)
07024                   {
07025                     m_spec.m_current_token = EOS;
07026                     m_spec.m_lexeme = '\0';
07027                     return m_spec.m_current_token;
07028                   }
07029               }
07030             else if ('\"' == m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index])
07031               {
07032                 m_spec.m_in_quote = !m_spec.m_in_quote;
07033                 ++m_input.m_line_index;
07034                 
07035                 if (m_input.m_line_index >= m_input.m_line_read)
07036                   {
07037                     m_spec.m_current_token = EOS;
07038                     m_spec.m_lexeme = '\0';
07039                     return m_spec.m_current_token;
07040                   }
07041               }
07042             else
07043               {
07044                 break;
07045               }
07046           }
07047 
07048         if (m_input.m_line_index > m_input.m_line_read) {
07049           System.out.println("m_input.m_line_index = " + m_input.m_line_index);
07050           System.out.println("m_input.m_line_read = " + m_input.m_line_read);
07051           CUtility.ASSERT(m_input.m_line_index <= m_input.m_line_read);
07052         }
07053 
07054         /* Look for backslash, and corresponding 
07055            escape sequence. */
07056         if ('\\' == m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index])
07057           {
07058             saw_escape = true;
07059           }
07060         else
07061           {
07062             saw_escape = false;
07063           }
07064 
07065         if (false == m_spec.m_in_quote)
07066           {
07067             if (false == m_spec.m_in_ccl &&
07068                 CUtility.isspace(m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index]))
07069               {
07070                 /* White space means the end of 
07071                    the current regular expression. */
07072 
07073                 m_spec.m_current_token = EOS;
07074                 m_spec.m_lexeme = '\0';
07075                 return m_spec.m_current_token;
07076               }
07077 
07078             /* Process escape sequence, if needed. */
07079             if (saw_escape)
07080               {
07081                 m_spec.m_lexeme = expandEscape();
07082               }
07083             else
07084               {
07085                 m_spec.m_lexeme = m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index];
07086                 ++m_input.m_line_index;
07087               }
07088           }
07089         else
07090           {
07091             if (saw_escape 
07092                 && (m_input.m_line_index + 1) < m_input.m_line_read
07093                 && '\"' == m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index + 1])
07094               {
07095                 m_spec.m_lexeme = '\"';
07096                 m_input.m_line_index = m_input.m_line_index + 2;
07097               }
07098             else
07099               {
07100                 m_spec.m_lexeme = m_input.m_line[m_input.m_line_index];
07101                 ++m_input.m_line_index;
07102               }
07103           }
07104         
07105         code = (Integer) m_tokens.get(new Character(m_spec.m_lexeme));
07106         if (m_spec.m_in_quote || true == saw_escape)
07107           {
07108             m_spec.m_current_token = L;
07109           }
07110         else
07111           {
07112             if (null == code)
07113               {
07114                 m_spec.m_current_token = L;
07115               }
07116             else
07117               {
07118                 m_spec.m_current_token = code.intValue();
07119               }
07120           }
07121 
07122         if (CCL_START == m_spec.m_current_token) m_spec.m_in_ccl = true;
07123         if (CCL_END   == m_spec.m_current_token) m_spec.m_in_ccl = false;
07124 
07125         if (CUtility.FOODEBUG)
07126           {
07127             System.out.println("Lexeme: " + m_spec.m_lexeme
07128                                + "\tToken: " + m_spec.m_current_token
07129                                + "\tIndex: " + m_input.m_line_index);
07130           }
07131 
07132         return m_spec.m_current_token;
07133       }
07134 
07135   /***************************************************************
07136     Function: details
07137     Description: High level debugging routine.
07138     **************************************************************/
07139   private void details
07140     (
07141      )
07142       {
07143         Enumeration names;
07144         String name;
07145         String def;
07146         Enumeration states;
07147         String state;
07148         Integer index;
07149         int elem;
07150         int size;
07151 
07152         System.out.println();
07153         System.out.println("\t** Macros **");
07154         names = m_spec.m_macros.keys();
07155         while (names.hasMoreElements())
07156           {
07157             name = (String) names.nextElement();
07158             def = (String) m_spec.m_macros.get(name);
07159 
07160             if (CUtility.DEBUG)
07161               {
07162                 CUtility.ASSERT(null != name);
07163                 CUtility.ASSERT(null != def);
07164               }
07165 
07166             System.out.println("Macro name \"" + name 
07167                                + "\" has definition \"" 
07168                                + def + "\".");
07169           }
07170 
07171         System.out.println();
07172         System.out.println("\t** States **");
07173         states = m_spec.m_states.keys();
07174         while (states.hasMoreElements())
07175           {
07176             state = (String) states.nextElement();
07177             index = (Integer) m_spec.m_states.get(state);
07178 
07179             if (CUtility.DEBUG)
07180               {
07181                 CUtility.ASSERT(null != state);
07182                 CUtility.ASSERT(null != index);
07183               }
07184 
07185             System.out.println("State \"" + state 
07186                                + "\" has identifying index " 
07187                                + index.toString() + ".");
07188           }
07189             
07190         System.out.println();
07191         System.out.println("\t** Character Counting **");
07192         if (false == m_spec.m_count_chars)
07193           {
07194             System.out.println("Character counting is off.");
07195           }
07196         else
07197           {
07198             if (CUtility.DEBUG)
07199               {
07200                 CUtility.ASSERT(m_spec.m_count_lines);
07201               }
07202 
07203             System.out.println("Character counting is on.");
07204           }
07205 
07206         System.out.println();
07207         System.out.println("\t** Line Counting **");
07208         if (false == m_spec.m_count_lines)
07209           {
07210             System.out.println("Line counting is off.");
07211           }
07212         else
07213           {
07214             if (CUtility.DEBUG)
07215               {
07216                 CUtility.ASSERT(m_spec.m_count_lines);
07217               }
07218 
07219             System.out.println("Line counting is on.");
07220           }
07221 
07222         System.out.println();
07223         System.out.println("\t** Operating System Specificity **");
07224         if (false == m_spec.m_unix)
07225           {
07226             System.out.println("Not generating UNIX-specific code.");
07227             System.out.println("(This means that \"\\r\\n\" is a "
07228                                + "newline, rather than \"\\n\".)");
07229           }
07230         else
07231           {
07232             System.out.println("Generating UNIX-specific code.");
07233             System.out.println("(This means that \"\\n\" is a " 
07234                                + "newline, rather than \"\\r\\n\".)");
07235           }
07236 
07237         System.out.println();
07238         System.out.println("\t** Java CUP Compatibility **");
07239         if (false == m_spec.m_cup_compatible)
07240           {
07241             System.out.println("Generating CUP compatible code.");
07242             System.out.println("(Scanner implements "
07243                                + "java_cup.runtime.Scanner.)");
07244           }
07245         else
07246           {
07247             System.out.println("Not generating CUP compatible code.");
07248           }
07249         
07250         if (CUtility.FOODEBUG) {
07251           if (null != m_spec.m_nfa_states && null != m_spec.m_nfa_start)
07252             {
07253               System.out.println();
07254               System.out.println("\t** NFA machine **");
07255               print_nfa();
07256           }
07257         }
07258 
07259         if (null != m_spec.m_dtrans_vector)
07260           {
07261             System.out.println();
07262             System.out.println("\t** DFA transition table **");
07263             /*print_header();*/
07264           }
07265 
07266         /*if (null != m_spec.m_accept_vector && null != m_spec.m_anchor_array)
07267           {
07268             System.out.println();
07269             System.out.println("\t** Accept States and Anchor Vector **");
07270             print_accept();
07271           }*/
07272       }
