07274   /***************************************************************
07275     function: print_set
07276     **************************************************************/
07277   void print_set
07278     (
07279      Vector nfa_set
07280      )
07281       {
07282         int size; 
07283         int elem;
07284         CNfa nfa;
07285 
07286         size = nfa_set.size();
07287 
07288         if (0 == size)
07289           {
07290             System.out.print("empty ");
07291           }
07292         
07293         for (elem = 0; elem < size; ++elem)
07294           {
07295             nfa = (CNfa) nfa_set.elementAt(elem);
07296             /*System.out.print(m_spec.m_nfa_states.indexOf(nfa) + " ");*/
07297             System.out.print(nfa.m_label + " ");
07298           }
07299       }
07300 
07301    /***************************************************************
07302      Function: print_header
07303      **************************************************************/
07304   private void print_header
07305     (
07306      )
07307       {
07308         Enumeration states;
07309         int i;
07310         int j;
07311         int chars_printed=0;
07312         CDTrans dtrans;
07313         int last_transition;
07314         String str;
07315         CAccept accept;
07316         String state;
07317         Integer index;
07318 
07319         System.out.println("/*---------------------- DFA -----------------------");
07320         
07321         states = m_spec.m_states.keys();
07322         while (states.hasMoreElements())
07323           {
07324             state = (String) states.nextElement();
07325             index = (Integer) m_spec.m_states.get(state);
07326 
07327             if (CUtility.DEBUG)
07328               {
07329                 CUtility.ASSERT(null != state);
07330                 CUtility.ASSERT(null != index);
07331               }
07332 
07333             System.out.println("State \"" + state 
07334                                + "\" has identifying index " 
07335                                + index.toString() + ".");
07336 
07337             i = index.intValue();
07338             if (CDTrans.F != m_spec.m_state_dtrans[i])
07339               {
07340                 System.out.println("\tStart index in transition table: "
07341                                    + m_spec.m_state_dtrans[i]);
07342               }
07343             else
07344               {
07345                 System.out.println("\tNo associated transition states.");
07346               }
07347           }
07348 
07349         for (i = 0; i < m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.size(); ++i)
07350           {
07351             dtrans = (CDTrans) m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.elementAt(i);
07352 
07353             if (null == m_spec.m_accept_vector && null == m_spec.m_anchor_array)
07354               {
07355                 if (null == dtrans.m_accept)
07356                   {
07357                     System.out.print(" * State " + i + " [nonaccepting]");
07358                   }
07359                 else
07360                   {
07361                     System.out.print(" * State " + i 
07362                                      + " [accepting, line "
07363                                      + dtrans.m_accept.m_line_number 
07364                                      + " <"
07365                                      + (new String(dtrans.m_accept.m_action,0,
07366                                                    dtrans.m_accept.m_action_read))
07367                                      + ">]");
07368                     if (CSpec.NONE != dtrans.m_anchor)
07369                       {
07370                         System.out.print(" Anchor: "
07371                                          + ((0 != (dtrans.m_anchor & CSpec.START)) 
07372                                             ? "start " : "")
07373                                          + ((0 != (dtrans.m_anchor & CSpec.END)) 
07374                                             ? "end " : ""));
07375                       }
07376                   }
07377               }
07378             else
07379               {
07380                 accept = (CAccept) m_spec.m_accept_vector.elementAt(i);
07381 
07382                 if (null == accept)
07383                   {
07384                     System.out.print(" * State " + i + " [nonaccepting]");
07385                   }
07386                 else
07387                   {
07388                     System.out.print(" * State " + i 
07389                                      + " [accepting, line "
07390                                      + accept.m_line_number 
07391                                      + " <"
07392                                      + (new String(accept.m_action,0,
07393                                                    accept.m_action_read))
07394                                      + ">]");
07395                     if (CSpec.NONE != m_spec.m_anchor_array[i])
07396                       {
07397                         System.out.print(" Anchor: "
07398                                          + ((0 != (m_spec.m_anchor_array[i] & CSpec.START)) 
07399                                             ? "start " : "")
07400                                          + ((0 != (m_spec.m_anchor_array[i] & CSpec.END)) 
07401                                             ? "end " : ""));
07402                       }
07403                   }
07404               }
07405 
07406             last_transition = -1;
07407             for (j = 0; j < m_spec.m_dtrans_ncols; ++j)
07408               {
07409                 if (CDTrans.F != dtrans.m_dtrans[j])
07410                   {
07411                     if (last_transition != dtrans.m_dtrans[j])
07412                       {
07413                         System.out.println();
07414                         System.out.print(" *    goto " + dtrans.m_dtrans[j]
07415                                          + " on ");
07416                         chars_printed = 0;
07417                       }
07418                     
07419                     str = interp_int((int) j);
07420                     System.out.print(str);
07421                                 
07422                     chars_printed = chars_printed + str.length(); 
07423                     if (56 < chars_printed)
07424                       {
07425                         System.out.println();
07426                         System.out.print(" *             ");
07427                         chars_printed = 0;
07428                       }
07429                     
07430                     last_transition = dtrans.m_dtrans[j];
07431                   }
07432               }
07433             System.out.println();
07434           }
07435         System.out.println(" */");
07436         System.out.println();
07437       }
07438 }
07439 
07440 /*
07441  * SparseBitSet 25-Jul-1999.
07442  * C. Scott Ananian <cananian@alumni.princeton.edu>
07443  *
07444  * Re-implementation of the standard java.util.BitSet to support sparse
07445  * sets, which we need to efficiently support unicode character classes.
07446  */
07447 
07455 final class SparseBitSet implements Cloneable {
07457     int  offs[];
07459     long bits[];
07461     int size;
07463     static final private int LG_BITS = 6;
07465     static final private int BITS = 1<<LG_BITS;
07467     static final private int BITS_M1 = BITS-1;
07468 
07472     public SparseBitSet() {
07473         bits = new long[4];
07474         offs = new int [4];
07475         size = 0;
07476     }
07477 
07482     public SparseBitSet(int nbits) {
07483         this();
07484     }
07485 
07489     public SparseBitSet(SparseBitSet set) {
07490         bits = new long[set.size];
07491         offs = new int [set.size];
07492         size = 0;
07493     }
07494 
07495     private void new_block(int bnum) {
07496         new_block(bsearch(bnum), bnum);
07497     }
07498     private void new_block(int idx, int bnum) {
07499         if (size==bits.length) { // resize
07500             long[] nbits = new long[size*3];
07501             int [] noffs = new int [size*3];
07502             System.arraycopy(bits, 0, nbits, 0, size);
07503             System.arraycopy(offs, 0, noffs, 0, size);
07504             bits = nbits;
07505             offs = noffs;
07506         }
07507         CUtility.ASSERT(size<bits.length);
07508         insert_block(idx, bnum);
07509     }
07510     private void insert_block(int idx, int bnum) {
07511         CUtility.ASSERT(idx<=size);
07512         CUtility.ASSERT(idx==size || offs[idx]!=bnum);
07513         System.arraycopy(bits, idx, bits, idx+1, size-idx);
07514         System.arraycopy(offs, idx, offs, idx+1, size-idx);
07515         offs[idx]=bnum;
07516         bits[idx]=0; //clear them bits.
07517         size++;
07518     }
07519     private int bsearch(int bnum) {
07520         int l=0, r=size; // search interval is [l, r)
07521         while (l<r) {
07522             int p = (l+r)/2;
07523             if (bnum<offs[p]) r=p;
07524             else if (bnum>offs[p]) l=p+1;
07525             else return p;
07526         }
07527         CUtility.ASSERT(l==r);
07528         return l; // index at which the bnum *should* be, if it's not.
07529     }
07530             
07535     public void set(int bit) {
07536         int bnum = bit >> LG_BITS;
07537         int idx  = bsearch(bnum);
07538         if (idx >= size || offs[idx]!=bnum)
07539             new_block(idx, bnum);
07540         bits[idx] |= (1L << (bit & BITS_M1) );
07541     }
07542 
07547     public void clear(int bit) {
07548         int bnum = bit >> LG_BITS;
07549         int idx  = bsearch(bnum);
07550         if (idx >= size || offs[idx]!=bnum)
07551             new_block(idx, bnum);
07552         bits[idx] &= ~(1L << (bit & BITS_M1) );
07553     }
07554 
07558     public void clearAll() {
07559         size = 0;
07560     }
07561 
07566     public boolean get(int bit) {
07567         int bnum = bit >> LG_BITS;
07568         int idx  = bsearch(bnum);
07569         if (idx >= size || offs[idx]!=bnum)
07570             return false;
07571         return 0 != ( bits[idx] & (1L << (bit & BITS_M1) ) );
07572     }
07573 
07578     public void and(SparseBitSet set) {
07579         binop(this, set, AND);
07580     }
07581 
07586     public void or(SparseBitSet set) {
07587         binop(this, set, OR);
07588     }
07589 
07594     public void xor(SparseBitSet set) {
07595         binop(this, set, XOR);
07596     }
07597 
07598     // BINARY OPERATION MACHINERY
07599     private static interface BinOp {
07600         public long op(long a, long b);
07601     }
07602     private static final BinOp AND = new BinOp() {
07603         public final long op(long a, long b) { return a & b; }
07604     };
07605     private static final BinOp OR = new BinOp() {
07606         public final long op(long a, long b) { return a | b; }
07607     };
07608     private static final BinOp XOR = new BinOp() {
07609         public final long op(long a, long b) { return a ^ b; }
07610     };
07611     private static final void binop(SparseBitSet a, SparseBitSet b, BinOp op) {
07612         int  nsize = a.size + b.size;
07613         long[] nbits; 
07614         int [] noffs;
07615         int a_zero, a_size;
07616         // be very clever and avoid allocating more memory if we can.
07617         if (a.bits.length < nsize) { // oh well, have to make working space.
07618             nbits = new long[nsize];
07619             noffs = new int [nsize];
07620             a_zero  = 0; a_size = a.size;
07621         } else { // reduce, reuse, recycle!
07622             nbits = a.bits;
07623             noffs = a.offs;
07624             a_zero = a.bits.length - a.size; a_size = a.bits.length;
07625             System.arraycopy(a.bits, 0, a.bits, a_zero, a.size);
07626             System.arraycopy(a.offs, 0, a.offs, a_zero, a.size);
07627         }
07628         // ok, crunch through and binop those sets!
07629         nsize = 0;
07630         for (int i=a_zero, j=0; i<a_size || j<b.size; ) {
07631             long nb; int no;
07632             if (i<a_size && (j>=b.size || a.offs[i] < b.offs[j])) {
07633                 nb = op.op(a.bits[i], 0);
07634                 no = a.offs[i];
07635                 i++;
07636             } else if (j<b.size && (i>=a_size || a.offs[i] > b.offs[j])) {
07637                 nb = op.op(0, b.bits[j]);
07638                 no = b.offs[j];
07639                 j++;
07640             } else { // equal keys; merge.
07641                 nb = op.op(a.bits[i], b.bits[j]);
07642                 no = a.offs[i];
07643                 i++; j++;
07644             }
07645             if (nb!=0) {
07646                 nbits[nsize] = nb;
07647                 noffs[nsize] = no;
07648                 nsize++;
07649             }
07650         }
07651         a.bits = nbits;
07652         a.offs = noffs;
07653         a.size = nsize;
07654     }
07655 
07659     public int hashCode() {
07660         long h = 1234;
07661         for (int i=0; i<size; i++)
07662             h ^= bits[i] * offs[i];
07663         return (int)((h >> 32) ^ h);
07664     }
07665 
07669     public int size() {
07670         return (size==0)?0:((1+offs[size-1]) << LG_BITS);
07671     }
07672 
07678     public boolean equals(Object obj) {
07679         if ((obj != null) && (obj instanceof SparseBitSet))
07680             return equals(this, (SparseBitSet)obj); 
07681         return false;
07682     }
07687     public static boolean equals(SparseBitSet a, SparseBitSet b) {
07688         for (int i=0, j=0; i<a.size || j<b.size; ) {
07689             if (i<a.size && (j>=b.size || a.offs[i] < b.offs[j])) {
07690                 if (a.bits[i++]!=0) return false;
07691             } else if (j<b.size && (i>=a.size || a.offs[i] > b.offs[j])) {
07692                 if (b.bits[j++]!=0) return false;
07693             } else { // equal keys
07694                 if (a.bits[i++]!=b.bits[j++]) return false;
07695             }
07696         }
07697         return true;
07698     }
07699 
07703     public Object clone() {
07704         try { 
07705             SparseBitSet set = (SparseBitSet)super.clone();
07706             set.bits = (long[]) bits.clone();
07707             set.offs = (int []) offs.clone();
07708             return set;
07709         } catch (CloneNotSupportedException e) {
07710             // this shouldn't happen, since we are Cloneable
07711             throw new InternalError();
07712         }
07713     }
07714 
07719     public Enumeration elements() {
07720         return new Enumeration() {
07721             int idx=-1, bit=BITS;
07722             { advance(); }
07723             public boolean hasMoreElements() {
07724                 return (idx<size);
07725             }
07726             public Object nextElement() {
07727                 int r = bit + (offs[idx] << LG_BITS);
07728                 advance();
07729                 return new Integer(r);
07730             }
07731             private void advance() {
07732                 while (idx<size) {
07733                     while (++bit<BITS)
07734                         if (0!=(bits[idx] & (1L<<bit)))
07735                             return;
07736                     idx++; bit=-1;
07737                 }
07738             }
07739         };
07740     }
07744     public String toString() {
07745         StringBuffer sb = new StringBuffer();
07746         sb.append('{');
07747         for (Enumeration e=elements(); e.hasMoreElements(); ) {
07748             if (sb.length() > 1) sb.append(", ");
07749             sb.append(e.nextElement());
07750         }
07751         sb.append('}');
07752         return sb.toString();
07753     }
07754 
07756     private boolean isValid() {
07757         if (bits.length!=offs.length) return false;
07758         if (size>bits.length) return false;
07759         if (size!=0 && 0<=offs[0]) return false;
07760         for (int i=1; i<size; i++)
07761             if (offs[i] < offs[i-1])
07762                     return false;
07763         return true;
07764     }
07766     public static void main(String[] args) {
07767         final int ITER = 500;
07768         final int RANGE= 65536;
07769         SparseBitSet a = new SparseBitSet();
07770         CUtility.ASSERT(!a.get(0) && !a.get(1));
07771         CUtility.ASSERT(!a.get(123329));
07772         a.set(0); CUtility.ASSERT(a.get(0) && !a.get(1));
07773         a.set(1); CUtility.ASSERT(a.get(0) && a.get(1));
07774         a.clearAll();
07775         CUtility.ASSERT(!a.get(0) && !a.get(1));
07776         java.util.Random r = new java.util.Random();
07777         java.util.Vector v = new java.util.Vector();
07778         for (int n=0; n<ITER; n++) {
07779             int rr = ((r.nextInt()>>>1) % RANGE) << 1;
07780             a.set(rr); v.addElement(new Integer(rr));
07781             // check that all the numbers are there.
07782             CUtility.ASSERT(a.get(rr) && !a.get(rr+1) && !a.get(rr-1));
07783             for (int i=0; i<v.size(); i++)
07784                 CUtility.ASSERT(a.get(((Integer)v.elementAt(i)).intValue()));
07785         }
07786         SparseBitSet b = (SparseBitSet) a.clone();
07787         CUtility.ASSERT(a.equals(b) && b.equals(a));
07788         for (int n=0; n<ITER/2; n++) {
07789             int rr = (r.nextInt()>>>1) % v.size();
07790             int m = ((Integer)v.elementAt(rr)).intValue();
07791             b.clear(m); v.removeElementAt(rr);
07792             // check that numbers are removed properly.
07793             CUtility.ASSERT(!b.get(m));
07794         }
07795         CUtility.ASSERT(!a.equals(b));
07796         SparseBitSet c = (SparseBitSet) a.clone();
07797         SparseBitSet d = (SparseBitSet) a.clone();
07798         c.and(a);
07799         CUtility.ASSERT(c.equals(a) && a.equals(c));
07800         c.xor(a);
07801         CUtility.ASSERT(!c.equals(a) && c.size()==0);
07802         d.or(b);
07803         CUtility.ASSERT(d.equals(a) && !b.equals(d));
07804         d.and(b);
07805         CUtility.ASSERT(!d.equals(a) && b.equals(d));
07806         d.xor(a);
07807         CUtility.ASSERT(!d.equals(a) && !b.equals(d));
07808         c.or(d); c.or(b);
07809         CUtility.ASSERT(c.equals(a) && a.equals(c));
07810         c = (SparseBitSet) d.clone();
07811         c.and(b);
07812         CUtility.ASSERT(c.size()==0);
07813         System.out.println("Success.");
07814     }
07815 }
